trans-unit.target: 一个简单的图形可以用

trans-unit.source: A slightly different syntax is also supported for reasons of backwards compatibility. If no interpolation algorithm has been explicitly selected, the qnorm algorithm is assumed. Up to three comma-separated, optional parameters can be specified, which are interpreted as the the number of rows, the number of columns, and the norm value, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 由于向后兼容，还支持稍微不同的语法。如果没有显式选择插值算法，则采用qnorm算法。最多可以指定三个逗号分隔的可选参数，这些参数分别解释为行数，列数和标准值。

trans-unit.source: A starting quote must either be preceded by a white space, or start the string. This means that apostrophes in the middle or at the end of words are considered as parts of the respective word:
trans-unit.target: 起始引号必须在前面加一个空格,或者在字符串的开头。这意味着,单词中间或词尾的省略号被视为相应单词的一部分。

trans-unit.source: A string which contains a numerical value is promoted to the corresponding integer or real value if used in a numerical expression. Thus ("3" + "4" == 7) and (6.78 == "6.78") both evaluate to true. An integer, but not a real or complex value, is promoted to a string if used in string concatenation. A typical case is the use of integers to construct file names or other strings; e.g. ("file" . 4 eq "file4") is true.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含数值的字符串,如果用于数值表达式中,则会被提升为相应的整数或实数。因此("3"+"4"==7)和(6.78=="6.78")都计算为真。如果在字符串连接中使用整数,但不是实值或复数,则会被提升为字符串。一个典型的例子是使用整数来构造文件名或其他字符串;例如("file".4 eq "file4")为真。

trans-unit.source: A summation expression has the form
trans-unit.target: 求和表达式的形式是

trans-unit.source: A technical issue: The larger the ratio of the largest and the smallest absolute parameter values, the slower the fit will converge. If the ratio is close to or above the inverse of the machine floating point precision, it may take next to forever to converge, or refuse to converge at all. You will either have to adapt your function to avoid this, e.g., replace 'parameter' by '1e9*parameter' in the function definition, and divide the starting value by 1e9 or use set fit prescale which does this internally according to the parameter starting values.
trans-unit.target: 一个技术问题：绝对值的最大值与最小值之比越大，拟合收敛的速度就越慢。如果该比率接近或高于机器浮点精度的倒数，则可能几乎要永远收敛，或者根本不收敛。您将不得不调整功能来避免这种情况，例如，在函数定义中用“ 1e9 * parameter”替换“ parameter”，然后将起始值除以1e9，或者使用set fit prescale，该函数根据参数start在内部进行此操作价值观。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 (or not defining it at all) means that there is no limit.
trans-unit.target: 值为0(或根本没有定义)表示没有限制。

trans-unit.source: A variable name can contain the wildcard character * as last character. If the wildcard character is found, all variables with names that begin with the prefix preceding the wildcard will be removed. This is useful to remove several variables sharing a common prefix. Note that the wildcard character is only allowed at the end of the variable name! Specifying the wildcard character as sole argument to undefine has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 变量名可以包含通配符*作为最后一个字符。如果找到通配符，则所有名称以通配符之前的前缀开头的变量都将被删除。这对于删除几个共享公共前缀的变量很有用。注意，通配符只能在变量名的末尾使用！指定通配符作为唯一的参数来取消定义没有任何影响。

trans-unit.source: About label positioning: Use gnuplot defaults (mostly sensible, but sometimes not really best):
trans-unit.target: 关于标签定位。使用gnuplot默认值(大部分是合理的,但有时并不是最好的)。

trans-unit.source: Acsplines
trans-unit.target: Acsplines

trans-unit.source: Actually for grid data it is not necessary to keep the x values constant within a block, nor is it necessary to keep the same sequence of y values. gnuplot requires only that the number of points be the same for each block. However since the surface mesh, from which contours are derived, connects sequentially corresponding points, the effect of an irregular grid on a surface plot is unpredictable and should be examined on a case-by-case basis.
trans-unit.target: 实际上，对于网格数据，不必在一个块内保持x值恒定，也不必保持y序列相同。gnuplot仅要求每个块的点数相同。但是，由于从中得出轮廓的曲面网格依次连接了相应的点，因此，不规则网格对曲面图的影响是不可预测的，应逐案检查。

trans-unit.source: Additional point-plot symbols are also available in the fig driver. The symbols can be used through pointtype values % 100 above 50, with different fill intensities controlled by <pointtype> % 5 and outlines in black (for <pointtype> % 10 < 5) or in the current color. Available symbols are
trans-unit.target: 图驱动程序中还提供了其他点图符号。可以通过点类型值％100（大于50）来使用这些符号，其不同的填充强度由<pointtype>％5控制，并以黑色（对于<pointtype>％10 <5）或当前颜色显示轮廓。可用符号为

trans-unit.source: Additionally, for points in a grid format, splot can interpolate points having a common amplitude (see set contour) and can then connect those new points to display contour lines, either directly with straight-line segments or smoothed lines (see set cntrparam). Functions are already evaluated in a grid format, determined by set isosamples and set samples, while file data must either be in a grid format, as described in data-file, or be used to generate a grid (see set dgrid3d).
trans-unit.target: 另外，对于网格格式的点，splot可以插值具有相同幅度的点（请参阅设置轮廓），然后可以将这些新点连接到显示轮廓线，直接使用直线段或平滑线（请参见set cntrparam）。函数已经按照由set isosamples和set sample确定的网格格式进行了评估，而文件数据必须按照data-file中所述以网格格式进行，或者必须用于生成网格（请参见set dgrid3d）。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the range specifier of '+' supports giving a sampling increment.
trans-unit.target: 此外,'+'的范围指定器还支持给出一个采样增量。

trans-unit.source: Adjustable parameters
trans-unit.target: 可调参数

trans-unit.source: Adjustable parameters can be specified by a comma-separated list of variable names after the via keyword. Any variable that is not already defined is created with an initial value of 1.0. However, the fit is more likely to converge rapidly if the variables have been previously declared with more appropriate starting values.
trans-unit.target: 可调参数可以通过在via关键字之后用逗号分隔的变量名称列表来指定。使用初始值1.0创建尚未定义的任何变量。但是，如果先前已使用更合适的起始值声明变量，则拟合更有可能迅​​速收敛。

trans-unit.source: After each iteration step, detailed information about the current state of the fit is written to the display. The same information about the initial and final states is written to a log file, "fit.log". This file is always appended to, so as to not lose any previous fit history; it should be deleted or renamed as desired. By using the command set fit logfile, the name of the log file can be changed.
trans-unit.target: 在每个迭代步骤之后，有关拟合的当前状态的详细信息将写入显示屏。有关初始状态和最终状态的相同信息将写入日志文件“ fit.log”。此文件始终附加到文件中，以免丢失任何以前的拟合历史记录；应该根据需要将其删除或重命名。通过使用命令set fit logfile，可以更改日志文件的名称。

trans-unit.target: Aifm

trans-unit.source: Airy function Ai(x)
trans-unit.target: 空心函数Ai(x)

trans-unit.target: Algorithm

trans-unit.source: Alignment of enhanced text is wrong if it contains utf8 characters. Resizing of Windows console window does not work correctly due to a bug in libcaca. Closing the terminal window by clicking the "X" on the title line will terminate wgnuplot. Press "q" to close the window.
trans-unit.target: 如果包含 utf8 字符,增强型文本的对齐方式会出错。由于libcaca中的一个错误,Windows控制台窗口的大小调整不能正常工作。点击标题行上的 "X "关闭终端窗口会终止wgnuplot。按 "q "关闭窗口。

trans-unit.source: All PostScript printers or viewers should know about the standard set of Adobe fonts Times-Roman, Helvetica, Courier, and Symbol. It is likely that many additional fonts are also available, but the specific set depends on your system or printer configuration. Gnuplot does not know or care about this; the output *.ps or *.eps files that it creates will simply refer to whatever font names you request.
trans-unit.target: 所有PostScript打印机或查看器都应了解Adobe字体Times-Roman，Helvetica，Courier和Symbol的标准集合。可能还有许多其他字体可用，但是具体的字体集取决于您的系统或打印机配置。 Gnuplot不知道或不在乎。它创建的输出* .ps或* .eps文件将仅引用您请求的任何字体名称。

trans-unit.source: All arguments will be provided to the selected script for further evaluation. E.g. 'set term lua tikz help' will cause the script itself to print additional help on options and choices for the script.
trans-unit.target: 所有的参数都会提供给所选的脚本,以便进一步评估。例如,'set term lua tikz help'将导致脚本本身打印关于脚本选项和选择的额外帮助。

trans-unit.source: All distances in the CGM file are in abstract units. The application that reads the file determines the size of the final plot. By default, the width of the final plot is assumed to be 6 inches (15.24 cm). This distance is used to calculate the correct font size, and may be changed with the width option. The keyword should be followed by the width in points. (Here, a point is 1/72 inch, as in PostScript. This unit is known as a "big point" in TeX.) Gnuplot expressions can be used to convert from other units.
trans-unit.target: CGM文件中的所有距离均以抽象单位表示。读取文件的应用程序确定最终绘图的大小。默认情况下，最终图的宽度假定为6英寸（15.24厘米）。此距离用于计算正确的字体大小，并且可以使用width选项进行更改。关键字后应跟以点为单位的宽度。 （在这里，点是1/72英寸，如PostScript中一样。该单位在TeX中被称为“大点”。）Gnuplot 表达式可用于从其他单位转换。

trans-unit.source: All drivers for LaTeX offer a special way of controlling text positioning: If any text string begins with '{', you also need to include a '}' at the end of the text, and the whole text will be centered both horizontally and vertically by LaTeX. — If the text string begins with '[', you need to continue it with: a position specification (up to two out of t,b,l,r), ']{', the text itself, and finally, '}'. The text itself may be anything LaTeX can typeset as an LR-box. \rule{}{}'s may help for best positioning.
trans-unit.target: LaTeX的所有驱动程序都提供了一种特殊的方式来控制文本位置：如果任何文本字符串以“ {”开头，则还需要在文本末尾包含“}”，并且整个文本将在水平和垂直方向上居中由LaTeX。 —如果文本字符串以'['开头，则需要以以下位置继续：位置说明（t，b，l，r中最多两个），'] {'，文本本身，最后是'} '。文本本身可以是LaTeX可以将其排版为LR-box的任何内容。 \ rule {} {}可能有助于最佳定位。

trans-unit.source: All drivers for LaTeX offer a special way of controlling text positioning: If any text string begins with '{', you also need to include a '}' at the end of the text, and the whole text will be centered both horizontally and vertically. If the text string begins with '[', you need to follow this with a position specification (up to two out of t,b,l,r), ']{', the text itself, and finally '}'. The text itself may be anything LaTeX can typeset as an LR-box. ' \rule{}{}'s may help for best positioning.
trans-unit.target: 所有LaTeX的驱动程序都提供了一种特殊的方式来控制文本定位。如果任何文本字符串以'{'开头,你还需要在文本末尾包含一个'}',整个文本将在水平和垂直方向上居中。如果文本字符串以'['开头,你需要在后面加上一个位置规范(t,b,l,r中最多两个),']{',文本本身,最后是'}'。文本本身可以是任何 LaTeX 可以排版为 LR 框的内容。'rule/{}{}'的可能有助于获得最佳定位。

trans-unit.source: All lines have the property dashtype solid unless you specify otherwise. You can change the default for a particular linetype using the command set linetype so that it affects all subsequent commands, or you can include the desired dashtype as part of the plot or other command.
trans-unit.target: 除非另外指定，否则所有行的属性dashtype均为solid。您可以使用命令集线型更改特定线型的默认设置，以使其影响所有后续命令，或​​者可以将所需的破折号包括在绘图或其他命令中。

trans-unit.source: All plots produced by the canvas terminal are mouseable. The additional keyword mousing causes the standalone mode to add a mouse-tracking box underneath the plot. It also adds a link to a javascript file 'gnuplot_mouse.js' and to a stylesheet for the mouse box 'gnuplot_mouse.css' in the same local or URL directory as 'canvastext.js'.
trans-unit.target: 画布终端生成的所有图都可通过鼠标单击。附加的关键字鼠标移动使独立模式在绘图下添加一个鼠标跟踪框。它还在与'canvastext.js'相同的本地或URL目录中，添加了指向javascript文件'gnuplot_mouse.js'的链接以及鼠标框'gnuplot_mouse.css'的样式表的链接。

trans-unit.source: All the options are optional. If font information is given, it must be at the end, with size (if present) last. The size is needed to select a size for the font, even if the font name includes size information. For example, set term mp "cmtt12" selects cmtt12 shrunk to the default size 10. This is probably not what you want or you would have used cmtt10.
trans-unit.target: 所有选项都是可选的。如果提供了字体信息，则必须在末尾，最后加上大小（如果存在）。即使字体名称包含大小信息，也需要使用大小来选择字体的大小。例如，设置术语mp“ cmtt12”会将cmtt12缩小选择为默认大小10。这可能不是您想要的，或者您将使用cmtt10。

trans-unit.source: All tic marks are drawn using the same line properties as the plot border (see set border).
trans-unit.target: 使用与绘图边框相同的线属性绘制所有刻度线（请参见set border）。

trans-unit.source: All values for all color spaces are limited to [0,1].
trans-unit.target: 所有颜色空间的值都限制在[0,1]。

trans-unit.source: Also, the set parametric function implies a new range of values. Whereas the normal f(x) and f(x,y) style plotting assume an xrange and yrange (and zrange), the parametric mode additionally specifies a trange, urange, and vrange. These ranges may be set directly with set trange, set urange, and set vrange, or by specifying the range on the plot or splot commands. Currently the default range for these parametric variables is [-5:5]. Setting the ranges to something more meaningful is expected.
trans-unit.target: 同样，设置的参数函数意味着新的值范围。正常的f（x）和f（x，y）样式图假定xrange和yrange（和zrange），而参数模式另外指定trange，urange和vrange。这些范围可以使用set trange，set urange和set vrange直接设置，或者通过在plot或splot命令上指定范围来设置。当前，这些参数变量的默认范围是[-5：5]。期望将范围设置为更有意义的值。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively you can provide a fixed bin width, in which case nbins is calculated as the smallest number of bins that will span the range.
trans-unit.target: 或者你可以提供一个固定的料仓宽度,在这种情况下,nbins被计算为跨越范围的最小料仓数。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, an explicit width for each box-and-whiskers grouping may be specified in an optional 6th column of data. The width must be given in the same units as the x coordinate.
trans-unit.target: 另外,可以在第6列数据中为每个盒须组指定一个明确的宽度。宽度必须以与x坐标相同的单位给出。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, in curve-fitting, functions are selected independent of a model (on the basis of experience as to which are likely to describe the trend of the data with the desired resolution and a minimum number of parameters*functions.) The fit solution then provides an analytic representation of the curve.
trans-unit.target: 或者，在曲线拟合中，可以独立于模型选择函数（基于经验，这些经验很可能以所需的分辨率和最少数量的参数*函数描述数据的趋势。）然后，拟合解决方案提供曲线的解析表示。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can specify the fraction of the total number of points that the whiskers should span. In this case the range is extended symmetrically from the median value until it encompasses the requested fraction of the data set. Here again each whisker is constrained to end at a point in the data set. To span 95% of the points in the set
trans-unit.target: 或者,您也可以指定晶须应跨越的点总数的分数。在这种情况下,范围从中值开始对称地扩展,直到它包含所要求的数据集的分数。这里,每个晶须再次被限制在数据集的一个点上结束。要跨越数据集中95%的点。

trans-unit.source: Although it is possible to include non-alphabetic symbols by temporarily switching to a special font, e.g. the Adobe Symbol font, the preferred method is now to specify the unicode entry point for the desired symbols using their UTF-8 encoding. See encoding and locale.
trans-unit.target: 尽管可以通过临时切换到特殊字体（例如Adobe Symbol字体）来包含非字母符号，但现在的首选方法是使用UTF-8编码为所需符号指定unicode入口点。请参阅编码和语言环境。

trans-unit.source: An additional (5th or 7th) input column may be used to provide variable (per-datapoint) color information (see linecolor and rgbcolor variable).
trans-unit.target: 附加的（第5或第7）输入列可用于提供可变的（每个数据点）颜色信息（请参阅linecolor和rgbcolor变量）。

trans-unit.source: An additional (6th) input column may be used to provide variable (per-record) color information (see linecolor and rgbcolor variable).
trans-unit.target: 可以使用附加的第（6）个输入列来提供可变的（每个记录）颜色信息（请参阅linecolor和rgbcolor变量）。

trans-unit.source: An additional (6th, or 7th if the 6th column is used for width data) input column may be used to provide variable (per-datapoint) color information (see linecolor and rgbcolor variable).
trans-unit.target: 附加的（第6列用于宽度数据，如果是第6列则为第7）输入列可用于提供可变的（每个数据点）颜色信息（请参阅linecolor和rgbcolor变量）。

trans-unit.source: An additional input column (4th or 5th) may be used to provide information such as variable point color.
trans-unit.target: 一个额外的输入列(第4或第5列)可用于提供可变点颜色等信息。

trans-unit.source: An additional input column (5th or 7th) may be used to provide variable (per-datapoint) color information.
trans-unit.target: 一个额外的输入列(第5或第7列)可用于提供可变的(每个数据点)颜色信息。

trans-unit.source: An empty <entry> will default to its order in the list of entries. For example, using ::4 is interpreted as using 1:2:4.
trans-unit.target: 空的<entry>将默认为条目列表中的顺序。例如，使用:: 4解释为使用1：2：4。

trans-unit.source: An example of using these routines is provided in the file bf_test.c, which generates binary files for the demo file demo/binary.dem.
trans-unit.target: 文件bf_test.c提供了使用这些例程的示例，该文件为演示文件demo / binary.dem生成二进制文件。

trans-unit.source: An explicit tic mark has a third parameter, the level. The default is level 0, a major tic. Level 1 generates a minor tic. Labels are never printed for minor tics. Major and minor tics may be auto-generated by the program or specified explicitly by the user. Tics with level 2 and higher must be explicitly specified by the user, and take priority over auto-generated tics. The size of tics marks at each level is controlled by the command set tics scale.
trans-unit.target: 明确的tic mark具有第三个参数，即level。默认值为0级，即主要抽动。1级会产生轻微抽动。标签永远不会打印出来。主次抽动可以由程序自动生成，也可以由用户明确指定。用户必须明确指定2级及更高级别的Tic，并且优先于自动生成的Tic。每个级别的抽签标记的大小由命令集抽签比例控制。

trans-unit.source: An explicit value for the boxwidth is interpreted as being a number of units along the current x axis (absolute) unless the modifier relative is given. If the x axis is a log-scale (see set log) then the value of boxwidth is truly "absolute" only at x=1; this physical width is maintained everywhere along the axis (i.e. the boxes do not become narrower the value of x increases). If the range spanned by a log scale x axis is far from x=1, some experimentation may be required to find a useful value of boxwidth.
trans-unit.target: 除非指定了修饰符相对值，否则boxwidth的显式值将被解释为沿当前x轴的单位数（绝对值）。如果x轴是对数刻度（请参阅set log），则boxwidth的值仅在x = 1时才真正“绝对”；沿轴的所有位置都保持该物理宽度（即，框不会变窄，x的值会增加）。如果对数标度x轴所跨越的范围距离x = 1远，则可能需要进行一些实验才能找到有用的boxwidth值。

trans-unit.source: An important special case of the splot command is to map the Z coordinate onto a 2D surface by projecting the plot along the Z axis. See set view map. This plot mode can be used to generate contour plots and heat maps. This figure shows contours plotted once with plot style lines, once with style labels.
trans-unit.target: splot命令的一个重要特殊情况是通过沿Z轴投影绘图将Z坐标映射到2D曲面上。请参阅设置视图图。该绘图模式可用于生成轮廓图和热图。该图显示了一次使用打印样式线绘制的轮廓，一次使用样式标签绘制的轮廓。

trans-unit.source: An independent sampling range can be provided immediately before the '+'. As in normal function plots, a name can be assigned to the independent variable. If given for the first plot element, the sampling range specifier has to be preceded by the sample keyword (see also plot sampling).
trans-unit.target: 可以在“ +”之前提供独立的采样范围。与正常功能图中一样，可以为自变量分配名称。如果为第一个图元素指定了采样范围说明符，则必须在其前面加上sample关键字（另请参阅图采样）。

trans-unit.source: An isoline is a curve parameterized by one of the surface parameters while the other surface parameter is fixed. Isolines provide a simple means to display a surface. By fixing the u parameter of surface s(u,v), the iso-u lines of the form c(v) = s(u0,v) are produced, and by fixing the v parameter, the iso-v lines of the form c(u) = s(u,v0) are produced.
trans-unit.target: 等值线是由一个曲面参数化的曲线,而另一个曲面参数是固定的。等值线提供了一个简单的方法来显示曲面。固定曲面的 u 参数 s(u,v),就会产生形式为 c(v)=s(u0,v)的等值线,固定 v 参数,就会产生形式为 c(u)=s(u,v0)的等值线。

trans-unit.source: An overall title can be put on the key (title "<text>") — see also syntax for the distinction between text in single- or double-quotes. The justification of the title defaults to center and can be changed by the keywords right or left
trans-unit.target: 整体标题可以放在键上（标题“ <text>”）-另请参见语法，以区分单引号或双引号中的文本。标题的对正默认为居中，可以通过关键字right或left更改

trans-unit.source: Angles
trans-unit.target: Angles

trans-unit.source: Another drawing algorithm, which would draw quadrangles around a given node by taking corners from averaged (x,y)-coordinates of its surrounding 4 nodes while using node's color, could be implemented in the future. This is already done for drawing images (2D grids) via image and rgbimage styles.
trans-unit.target: 将来可以实现另一种绘制算法，该算法将通过使用其周围4个节点的平均（x，y）坐标取角，同时使用节点的颜色来绘制给定节点周围的四边形。通过图像和rgbimage样式绘制图像（2D网格）已经完成。

trans-unit.source: Another example:
trans-unit.target: 另一个例子:

trans-unit.source: Another possibility is to set uniform margins for all plots in the layout with options layout margins and spacing, which must be used together. With margins you set the outer margins of the whole multiplot grid.
trans-unit.target: 另一种可能性是为布局中的所有图设置统一的页边距，并带有必须一起使用的选项“ layout margins”和“ spaces”。使用边距可以设置整个多图网格的外部边距。

trans-unit.source: Another way to plot "exper.dat" with errorlines (errorbars require three or four columns):
trans-unit.target: 另一种方法是用错误线绘制 "exper.dat"(错误条需要三列或四列)。

trans-unit.source: Any character is allowed in the string, but must match exactly. \t (tab) is recognized. Backslash-octals ( \nnn) are converted to char. If there is no separating character between the time/date elements, then %d, %m, %y, %H, %M and %S read two digits each. If a decimal point immediately follows the field read by %S, the decimal and any following digits are interpreted as a fractional second. %Y reads four digits. %j reads three digits. %b requires three characters, and %B requires as many as it needs.
trans-unit.target: 字符串中允许使用任何字符,但必须完全匹配。\识别t(tab)。反斜杠八位数(nnnnn)被转换为char。如果时间/日期元素之间没有分隔符,那么%d、%m、%y、%H、%M和%S各读两位数。如果小数点紧跟在%S读取的字段后面,那么小数点和后面的任何数字都被解释为小数点秒。%Y读取四位数。%j读三位数。%b需要三个字符,而%B需要多少字符就读多少字符。

trans-unit.source: Any command-line arguments are assumed to be either program options (first character is -) or names of files containing gnuplot commands. The option -e "command" may be used to force execution of a gnuplot command. Each file or command string will be executed in the order specified. The special filename "-" is indicates that commands are to be read from stdin. Gnuplot exits after the last file is processed. If no load files and no command strings are specified, gnuplot accepts interactive input from stdin.
trans-unit.target: 假定所有命令行参数均为程序选项（第一个字符为-）或包含gnuplot命令的文件名。选项-e“命令”可用于强制执行gnuplot命令。每个文件或命令字符串将按照指定的顺序执行。特殊文件名“-”表示要从标准输入中读取命令。在处理完最后一个文件后，Gnuplot退出。如果未指定任何加载文件且未指定命令字符串，则gnuplot接受来自stdin的交互式输入。

trans-unit.source: Any labels or arrows that have been defined will be drawn for each plot according to the current size and origin (unless their coordinates are defined in the screen system). Just about everything else that can be set is applied to each plot, too. If you want something to appear only once on the page, for instance a single time stamp, you'll need to put a set time/unset time pair around one of the plot, splot or replot commands within the set multiplot/unset multiplot block.
trans-unit.target: 将根据当前大小和原点为每个图绘制已定义的任何标签或箭头（除非在屏幕系统中定义了它们的坐标）。几乎所有可以设置的其他内容也都应用于每个图。如果你想要的东西在页面上只出现一次，例如一个时间标记，你需要把一个设定的时间 / 未设置时间对中的一个周围的情节，splot或重制的内指令集的multiplot / 取消设置的multiplot块。

trans-unit.source: Any of the numbers can be omitted; the increments default to unity, the start values to the first point or block, and the end values to the last point or block. ':' at the end of the every option is not permitted. If every is not specified, all points in all lines are plotted.
trans-unit.target: 可以省略任何数字。增量默认为1，起始值为第一个点或块，结束值为最后一个点或块。每个选项的末尾都不允许使用'：' 。如果未指定every，则将绘制所有线中的所有点。

trans-unit.source: Any points that lie outside the range of the whiskers are considered outliers. By default these are drawn as individual circles (pointtype 7). The option nooutliers disables this.
trans-unit.target: 晶须范围以外的任何点均被视为离群值。默认情况下，它们被绘制为单独的圆（点类型7）。选项nooutliers禁用此功能。

trans-unit.source: Any range may be partially or totally autoscaled, although it may not make sense to autoscale a parametric variable unless it is plotted with data.
trans-unit.target: 任何范围都可以部分或完全自动缩放,尽管自动缩放一个参数变量可能没有意义,除非它与数据一起绘制。

trans-unit.source: Appropriate weighting may be required since unit weights may cause one branch to predominate if there is a difference in the scale of the dependent variable. Fitting each branch separately, using the multi-branch solution as initial values, may give an indication as to the relative effect of each branch on the joint solution.
trans-unit.target: 可能需要适当的加权,因为如果因变量的比例有差异,单位加权可能会导致一个分支占主导地位。使用多分支解决方案作为初始值,分别拟合每个分支,可以说明每个分支对联合解决方案的相对影响。

trans-unit.source: Approximate the default palette used by MATLAB:
trans-unit.target: 近似于MATLAB使用的默认调色板。

trans-unit.source: Aqua
trans-unit.target: Aqua

trans-unit.source: Arbitrary arrows can be placed on a plot using the set arrow command.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用set arrow命令将任意箭头放置在绘图上。

trans-unit.source: Arbitrary labels can be placed on the plot using the set label command.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用set label命令将任意标签放置在绘图上。

trans-unit.source: Arguments
trans-unit.target: Arguments

trans-unit.source: Arguments specified after a replot command will be added onto the last plot or splot command (with an implied ',' separator) before it is repeated. replot accepts the same arguments as the plot and splot commands except that ranges cannot be specified. Thus you can use replot to plot a function against the second axes if the previous command was plot but not if it was splot.
trans-unit.target: 在重复绘图命令之后指定的参数将在重复之前添加到最后的绘图或绘图命令（带有隐含的“，”分隔符）上。replot接受与plot和splot命令相同的参数，但不能指定范围。因此，你可以使用重绘绘制函数对第二轴，如果前面的命令是阴谋但如果它是splot。

trans-unit.source: Arguments to math functions in gnuplot can be integer, real, or complex unless otherwise noted. Functions that accept or return angles (e.g. sin(x)) treat angle values as radians, but this may be changed to degrees using the command set angles.
trans-unit.target: 除非另有说明，否则gnuplot中数学函数的参数可以是整数，实数或复数。接受或返回角度的函数（例如sin（x））将角度值视为弧度，但是可以使用命令设置角度将其更改为度。

trans-unit.source: Arithmetic operations and most built-in functions support the use of complex arguments. Complex constants are expressed as {<real>,<imag>}, where <real> and <imag> must be numerical constants. Thus {0,1} represents 'i'. The real and imaginary components of complex value x can be extracted as real(x) and imag(x). The modulus is given by abs(x).
trans-unit.target: 算术运算和大多数内置函数都支持使用复杂的参数。复数常量表示为{<real>，<imag>}，其中<real>和<imag>必须是数字常量。因此，{0,1}代表“ i”。复数值x的实部和虚部可以提取为real（x）和imag（x）。模量由abs（x）给出。

trans-unit.source: Array
trans-unit.target: Array

trans-unit.source: Arrays
trans-unit.target: Arrays

trans-unit.source: Arrays are implemented as indexed lists of user variables. The elements in an array are not limited to a single type of variable. Arrays must be created explicitly before being referenced. The size of an array cannot be changed after creation. All elements are initially undefined. In most places an array element can be used instead of a named user variable. The cardinality (number of elements) of array A is given by the expression |A|.
trans-unit.target: 数组是作为用户变量的索引列表来实现的。数组中的元素不限于单一类型的变量。数组在被引用之前必须被显式创建。数组的大小在创建后不能改变。所有元素最初都是未定义的。在大多数地方,一个数组元素可以代替一个命名的用户变量。数组A的基数(元素数)由表达式|A|给出。

trans-unit.source: As an alternative to surfaces drawn using parametric or function mode, the pseudo-file '++' can be used to generate samples on a grid in the xy plane.
trans-unit.target: 作为使用参数模式或函数模式绘制曲面的替代方法,伪文件 "++"可以用来在xy平面的网格上生成样本。

trans-unit.source: As an example, if one has 2 independent variables, and errors for the first independent variable and the dependent variable, one uses the errors x,z qualifier, and a using qualifier with 5 columns, which are interpreted as x:y:z:sx:sz (where x and y are the independent variables, z the dependent variable, and sx and sz the standard deviations of x and z).
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果一个人有2个自变量，并且第一个自变量和因变量有错误，则使用错误x，z限定符，使用错误 5列的使用限定符，它们被解释为x：y：z： sx：sz（其中x和y是自变量，z是因变量，而sx和sz是x和z的标准偏差）。

trans-unit.source: As of gnuplot version 4.6, hidden3d also affects 3D plotting styles points, labels, vectors, and impulses even if no surface is present in the graph. Unobscured portions of each vector are drawn as line segments (no arrowheads). Individual plots within the graph may be explicitly excluded from this processing by appending the extra option nohidden3d to the with specifier.
trans-unit.target: 从gnuplot 4.6版开始，即使图形中没有表面，hidden3d也会影响3D绘制样式的点，标签，矢量和脉冲。每个向量的未遮盖部分绘制为线段（无箭头）。通过将额外选项nohidden3d附加到with 指示符中，可以明确地将图形中的各个图排除在此处理之外。

trans-unit.source: As usual <filename> may be '-' which means that the data follow the command inline and are terminated by a single e on a line of its own.
trans-unit.target: 与往常一样，<filename>可能是'-'，这意味着数据遵循命令内联，并在其自己的一行上以单个e终止。

trans-unit.source: At the conclusion fit reports 'stdfit', the standard deviation of the fit, which is the rms of the residuals, and the variance of the residuals, also called 'reduced chisquare' when the data points are weighted. The number of degrees of freedom (the number of data points minus the number of fitted parameters) is used in these estimates because the parameters used in calculating the residuals of the datapoints were obtained from the same data. If the data points have weights, gnuplot calculates the so-called p-value, i.e. one minus the cumulative distribution function of the chisquare-distribution for the number of degrees of freedom and the resulting chisquare, see practical_guidelines. These values are exported to the variables
trans-unit.target: 在结论中，拟合报告“ stdfit”，拟合的标准偏差（即残差的均方根值）以及对数据点进行加权时的残差方差（也称为“减少的卡方”）。在这些估计中使用自由度数（数据点数减去拟合参数数），因为用于计算数据点残差的参数是从同一数据中获得的。如果数据点具有权重，gnuplot的计算所谓的p值，即一个减去卡方分布的自由度的次数的累积分布函数，并将所得卡方，看到practical_guidelines。这些值将导出到变量

trans-unit.source: Automatic gamma correction via set palette gamma <gamma> can be done for gray maps (set palette gray) and for the cubehelix color palette schemes. Gamma = 1 produces a linear ramp of intensity. See test palette.

trans-unit.source: Autoscaling may be set individually on the x, y or z axis or globally on all axes. The default is to autoscale all axes. If you want to autoscale based on a subset of the plots in the figure, you can mark the other ones with the flag noautoscale. See datafile.

trans-unit.source: Autoscaling the independent variables (x for plot and x,y for splot) is a request to set the domain to match any data file being plotted. If there are no data files, autoscaling an independent variable has no effect. In other words, in the absence of a data file, functions alone do not affect the x range (or the y range if plotting z = f(x,y)).
trans-unit.target: 自动缩放自变量（x表示图，x，y表示splot）是一种将域设置为与要绘制的任何数据文件匹配的请求。如果没有数据文件，则自动缩放自变量无效。换句话说，在没有数据文件的情况下，仅函数不会影响x范围（如果绘制z = f（x，y），则不会影响y范围）。

trans-unit.source: Autoscaling: If <min> (the same applies for correspondingly to <max>) is an asterisk "*" autoscaling is turned on. The range in which autoscaling is being performed may be limited by a lower bound <lb> or an upper bound <ub> or both. The syntax is

trans-unit.source: Axis tick labels can be generated via a string function, usually taking a data column as an argument. The simplest form uses the data column itself as a string. That is, xticlabels(N) is shorthand for xticlabels(stringcolumn(N)). This example uses the contents of column 3 as x-axis tick labels.
trans-unit.target: 轴刻度线标签可以通过一个字符串函数生成,通常以一个数据列作为参数。最简单的形式是将数据列本身作为一个字符串。也就是说,xticlabels(N)是xticlabels(stringcolumn(N))的简写。这个例子使用第3列的内容作为X轴的刻度标签。

trans-unit.source: Axis tick labels may be generated for any of the plot axes: x x2 y y2 z. The ticlabels(<labelcol>) specifiers must come after all of the data coordinate specifiers in the using portion of the command. For each data point which has a valid set of X,Y[,Z] coordinates, the string value given to xticlabels() is added to the list of xtic labels at the same X coordinate as the point it belongs to. xticlabels() may be shortened to xtic() and so on.
trans-unit.target: 可以为任何绘图轴生成轴刻度标签：x x2 y y2 z。所述ticlabels（<labelcol>）说明符必须来后的所有的数据的坐标符使用的命令的部分。对于每个具有有效的X，Y [，Z]坐标集的数据点，将给xticlabels（）的字符串值添加到xtic标签列表中，并与它属于该点的X坐标相同。xticlabels（）可以缩短为xtic（），依此类推。

trans-unit.source: B = value("A") is effectively the same as B = A, where A is the name of a user-defined variable. This is useful when the name of the variable is itself held in a string variable. See user-defined variables. It also allows you to read the name of a variable from a data file. If the argument is a numerical expression, value() returns the value of that expression. If the argument is a string that does not correspond to a currently defined variable, value() returns NaN.
trans-unit.target: B = value（“ A”）实际上与B = A相同，其中A是用户定义变量的名称。当变量名本身保存在字符串变量中时，这很有用。请参阅用户定义的变量。它还允许您从数据文件中读取变量的名称。如果参数是数字表达式，则value（）返回该表达式的值。如果参数是与当前定义的变量不对应的字符串，则value（）返回NaN。

trans-unit.source: Backslash processing of special characters like \n (newline) and \345 (octal character code) is performed only for double-quoted strings. In single-quoted strings, backslashes are just ordinary characters. To get a single-quote (ascii 39) in a single-quoted string, it must be doubled. Thus the strings "d \" s' b \\" and 'd" s' ' b \' are completely equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 只有在双引号字符串中,才会对特殊字符进行反斜线处理,如:/n(换行)和/345(八进制字符代码)。在单引号字符串中,反斜线只是普通字符。要想在单引号字符串中得到一个单引号(ascii 39),必须将其加倍。因此,字符串 "d \" s' b \"和 "d" s' ' b \"是完全等同的。

trans-unit.source: Basically two different types of mappings can be used: Analytic formulae to convert gray to color, or discrete mapping tables which are interpolated. palette rgbformulae and palette functions use analytic formulae whereas palette defined and palette file use interpolated tables. palette rgbformulae reduces the size of postscript output to a minimum.
trans-unit.target: 基本上可以使用两种不同类型的映射：将灰阶转换为颜色的解析公式，或内插的离散映射表。选项板rgbformulae和选项板函数使用解析公式，而选项板定义和选项板文件使用插值表。调色板rgbformulae将后记输出的大小减小到最小。

trans-unit.source: Because some terminal types allow multiple plots to be written into a single output file, the output file is not automatically closed after plotting. In order to print or otherwise use the file safely, it should first be closed explicitly by using unset output or by using set output to close the previous file and then open a new one.
trans-unit.target: 由于某些终端类型允许将多个图写入单个输出文件，因此在绘制后不会自动关闭输出文件。为了安全地打印或以其他方式使用该文件，应首先通过使用未设置的输出或通过使用set输出的方式显式关闭该文件，以关闭前一个文件，然后打开一个新文件。

trans-unit.source: Both of these optimizations are intended to produce a smaller output file, but the decrease in size is probably only significant for long animations or very small frame sizes. The nooptimize option turns off both of the effects just described. Each frame is stored in its entirety along with a private color map. Note that it is possible to post-process a non-optimized animation using external utilities, and this post-processing can yield a smaller file than gnuplot's internal optimization mode. The default is nooptimize.
trans-unit.target: 这两种优化都是为了产生较小的输出文件，但是减小大小可能仅对长动画或非常小的帧大小有意义。该NOOPTIMIZE选项关闭两者的作用只是描述。每个帧均完整存储，并带有一个私有颜色图。请注意，可以使用外部实用程序对未优化的动画进行后处理，并且这种后处理可以生成比gnuplot的内部优化模式小的文件。默认值为nooptimize。

trans-unit.source: Boxplots are a common way to represent a statistical distribution of values. Quartile boundaries are determined such that 1/4 of the points have a value equal or less than the first quartile boundary, 1/2 of the points have a value equal or less than the second quartile (median) value, etc. A box is drawn around the region between the first and third quartiles, with a horizontal line at the median value. Whiskers extend from the box to user-specified limits. Points that lie outside these limits are drawn individually.
trans-unit.target: 曲线图是表示数值的统计分布的一种常用方法。四分位数边界的确定,使1/4的点的值等于或小于第一分位数边界,1/2的点的值等于或小于第二分位数(中位数)值,等等。在第一分位数和第三分位数之间的区域周围画一个方框,在中位数值处画一条水平线。蚕须从框中延伸到用户指定的极限。位于这些界限之外的点被单独绘制。

trans-unit.source: Built-in or user-defined functions can be displayed by the plot and splot commands in addition to, or instead of, data read from a file. The requested function is evaluated by sampling at regular intervals spanning the independent axis range[s]. See set samples and set isosamples. Example:
trans-unit.target: 除了从文件中读取的数据外，或代替从文件中读取的数据，可以通过plot和splot命令显示内置或用户定义的功能。通过跨独立轴范围的规则间隔进行采样来评估请求的功能。请参阅设置样本和设置isosamples。例：

trans-unit.source: By default dgrid3d is disabled. When enabled, 3D data read from a file are always treated as a scattered data set. A grid with dimensions derived from a bounding box of the scattered data and size as specified by the row/col_size parameters is created for plotting and contouring. The grid is equally spaced in x (rows) and in y (columns); the z values are computed as weighted averages or spline interpolations of the scattered points' z values. In other words, a regularly spaced grid is created and the a smooth approximation to the raw data is evaluated for all grid points. This approximation is plotted in place of the raw data.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，dgrid3d被禁用。启用后，从文件读取的3D数据始终被视为分散的数据集。将创建一个网格，该网格的尺寸由散乱数据的边界框派生，其大小由row / col_size参数指定，以进行绘制和绘制轮廓。网格在x（行）和y（列）中的间距相等。将z值计算为分散点的z值的加权平均值或样条插值。换句话说，将创建规则排列的网格，并为所有网格点评估原始数据的平滑近似。绘制此近似值代替原始数据。

trans-unit.source: By default gnuplot uses the default visual of the screen. The number of colors which can be allocated depends on the visual class chosen. On a visual class with a depth > 12bit, gnuplot starts with a maximal number of 0x200 colors. On a visual class with a depth > 8bit (but <= 12 bit) the maximal number of colors is 0x100, on <= 8bit displays the maximum number of colors is 240 (16 are left for line colors).
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，gnuplot使用屏幕的默认外观。可以分配的颜色数量取决于所选的视觉类别。在深度> 12bit的可视类中，gnuplot以最大数量的0x200颜色开始。在深度> 8位（但<= 12位）的视觉类上，最大颜色数为0x100，在<= 8位上显示最大颜色数为240（线条颜色保留16种）。

trans-unit.source: By default splot draws the xy plane completely below the plotted data. The offset between the lowest ztic and the xy plane can be changed by set xyplane. The orientation of a splot projection is controlled by set view. See set view and set xyplane for more information.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，splot将xy平面完全绘制在绘制的数据下方。最低的ztic和xy平面之间的偏移可以通过设置xyplane来更改。斑点投影的方向由设置视图控制。有关更多信息，请参见设置视图和设置xyplane。

trans-unit.source: By default a full circle is drawn. The optional qualifier arc specifies a starting angle and ending angle, in degrees, for one arc of the circle. The arc is always drawn counterclockwise.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下会绘制一个完整的圆圈。可选的限定符弧指定圆的一个弧的起始角度和终止角度（以度为单位）。弧线总是逆时针绘制。

trans-unit.source: By default a full circle will be drawn. It is possible to plot arc segments instead of full circles by specifying a start and end angle in the 4th and 5th columns. An optional 4th or 6th column can specify per-circle color. The start and end angles of the circle segments must be specified in degrees. See set style circle and set style fill.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，将绘制一个完整的圆圈。通过在第4列和第5列中指定起点和终点角度，可以绘制弧段而不是完整的圆。可选的第4列或第6列可以指定每个圆的颜色。圆弧段的起点和终点角度必须以度为单位。请参见设置样式圆圈和设置样式填充。

trans-unit.source: By default autoscaling sets the axis range limits to the nearest tic label position that includes all the plot data. Keywords fixmin, fixmax, fix or noextend tell gnuplot to disable extension of the axis range to the next tic mark position. In this case the axis range limit exactly matches the coordinate of the most extreme data point. set autoscale noextend is a synonym for set autoscale fix. Range extension for a single axis can be disabled by appending the noextend keyword to the corresponding range command, e.g.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，自动缩放会将轴范围限制设置为包括所有绘图数据的最近tic标签位置。关键字fixmin，fixmax，fix或noextend告诉gnuplot禁用将轴范围扩展到下一个tic标记位置。在这种情况下，轴范围限制与最极端数据点的坐标完全匹配。设置自动缩放noextend是一个同义词组自动缩放修复。通过将noextend关键字附加到相应的range命令，可以禁用单个轴的范围扩展。

trans-unit.source: By default boxplots are drawn in a style similar to candlesticks, but you have the option of using instead a style similar to finance bars.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,boxplots是以类似于蜡烛图的样式绘制的,但您也可以选择使用类似于金融条的样式。

trans-unit.source: By default contours are drawn using successive linetypes starting with the next linetype after that used for the corresponding surface. Thus splot x*y lt 5 would use lt 6 for the first contour generated. If hidden3d mode is active then each surface uses two linetypes. In this case using default settings would cause the first contour to use the same linetype as the hidden surface, which is undesirable. This can be avoided in either of two ways. (1) Use set hidden3d offset N to change the linetype used for the hidden surface. A good choice would be offset -1 since that will avoid all the contour linetypes. (2) Use the set cntrparam firstlinetype N option to specify a block of linetypes used for contour lines independent of whatever was used for the surface. This is particularly useful if you want to customize the set of contour linetypes. N <= 0 restores the default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，将使用连续的线型绘制轮廓，这些线型从对应表面使用的下一个线型开始。因此，曲线x * y lt 5将对生成的第一个轮廓使用lt 6。如果hidden3d模式处于活动状态，则每个曲面都使用两种线型。在这种情况下，使用默认设置将导致第一个轮廓使用与隐藏曲面相同的线型，这是不希望的。可以通过两种方式之一避免这种情况。 （1）使用set hidden3d偏移量N更改用于隐藏曲面的线型。一个好的选择是将偏移量-1，因为这样可以避免所有轮廓线型。 （2）使用设置cntrparam firstlinetype N选项来指定用于轮廓线的线型块，而与用于曲面的线型无关。如果要自定义轮廓线型集，此功能特别有用。N <= 0将恢复默认值。

trans-unit.source: By default each plot is listed in the key by the corresponding function or file name. You can give an explicit plot title instead using the title option.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，键中通过相应的功能或文件名列出每个图。您可以给定一个明确的绘图标题，而不使用title选项。

trans-unit.source: By default only one boxplot is produced that represents all y values from the second column of the using specification. However, an additional (fourth) column can be added to the specification. If present, the values of that column will be interpreted as the discrete levels of a factor variable. As many boxplots will be drawn as there are levels in the factor variable. The separation between these boxplots is 1.0 by default, but it can be changed by set style boxplot separation. By default, the value of the factor variable is shown as a tic label below (or above) each boxplot.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，仅产生一个箱形图，表示使用规范第二列中的所有y值。但是，可以在规范中添加其他（第四）列。如果存在，则该列的值将被解释为因子变量的离散级别。由于因子变量中有多个级别，因此将绘制尽可能多的箱线图。这些箱线图之间的间距默认为1.0，但可以通过设置样式箱线图间距来更改。默认情况下，因子变量的值在每个箱线图下方（或上方）显示为tic标签。

trans-unit.source: By default output png images use 256 indexed colors. The truecolor option instead creates TrueColor images with 24 bits of color information per pixel. Transparent fill styles require the truecolor option. See fillstyle. A transparent background is possible in either indexed or TrueColor images.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，输出的png图像使用256种索引颜色。相反，truecolor选项创建的TrueColor图像每个像素具有24位颜色信息。透明填充样式需要truecolor选项。参见fillstyle。在索引图像或TrueColor图像中都可以使用透明背景。

trans-unit.source: By default polar plots are oriented such that theta=0 is at the far right, with theta increasing counterclockwise. You can change both the origin and the sense explicitly. See set theta.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，极坐标图的方向是theta = 0位于最右边，theta逆时针增大。您可以显式更改原点和含义。参见set theta。

trans-unit.source: By default text rotation is done using a method that is fast, but can corrupt nearby colors depending on the background. If this is a problem, you can set the resource 'gnuplot.fastrotate' to 'off'
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,文本旋转是使用一种快速的方法来完成的,但会根据背景破坏附近的颜色。如果这是一个问题,您可以将资源'gnuplot.fastrotate'设置为'关闭'。

trans-unit.source: By default the "%c" format specifier for scientific notation used to generate axis tick labels uses a lower case u as a prefix to indicate "micro" (10^-6). The set micro command tells gnuplot to use a different typographic character (unicode U+00B5). The byte sequence used to represent this character depends on the current encoding. See format specifiers, encoding.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，用于生成轴刻度标签的科学符号“％c”格式说明符使用小写字母u作为前缀来表示“微”（10 ^ -6）。该组微命令告诉GNUPLOT使用不同的印刷字符（Unicode U + 00B5）。用于表示此字符的字节序列取决于当前编码。请参阅格式说明符，编码。

trans-unit.source: By default the history command prints a line number in front of each command. history quiet suppresses the number for this command only. set history quiet suppresses numbers for all future history commands.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，history命令在每个命令的前面打印一个行号。历史记录安静仅抑制此命令的编号。将历史记录设置为安静将取消所有将来的历史记录命令的编号。

trans-unit.source: By default the boxplots corresponding to different levels of the factor variable are not sorted; they will be drawn in the same order the levels are encountered in the data file. This behavior corresponds to the unsorted option. If the sorted option is active, the levels are first sorted alphabetically, and the boxplots are drawn in the sorted order.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，不对与因子变量的不同级别相对应的箱线图进行排序；它们将以与数据文件中遇到的级别相同的顺序绘制。这种行为相当于未排序选项。如果“ 排序”选项处于活动状态，则首先按字母顺序对级别进行排序，然后按排序顺序绘制框线图。

trans-unit.source: By default the canvas is transparent, but an explicit background color can be set with the background option.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，画布是透明的，但是可以使用background选项设置显式的背景色。

trans-unit.source: By default the colors assigned to pm3d objects are not dependent on orientation or viewing angle. This state corresponds to set pm3d nolighting. The command set pm3d lighting selects a simple lighting model consisting of a single fixed source of illumination contributing 50% of the overall lighting. The strength of this light relative to the ambient illumination can be adjusted by set pm3d lighting primary <fraction>. Inclusion of specular highlighting can be adjusted by setting a fractional contribution:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，分配给pm3d对象的颜色不依赖于方向或视角。此状态对应于设置pm3d nolighting。命令集pm3d照明选择一个简单的照明模型，该模型由单个固定照明源组成，该照明源占总照明量的50％。可以通过设置pm3d lighting primary <fraction>来调整此光相对于环境照明的强度。可以通过设置部分贡献来调整镜面高光的包含：

trans-unit.source: By default the contents of the current plot window are exported to the X11 clipboard in response to X events in the window. Setting the resource 'gnuplot*exportselection' to 'off' or 'false' will disable this.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,当前绘图窗口的内容会根据窗口中的X事件导出到X11剪贴板。将资源'gnuplot*exportselection'设置为'off'或'false'将禁用此功能。

trans-unit.source: By default the contours are generated in the reverse order specified (unsorted). Thus set cntrparam levels increment 0, 10, 100 will create 11 contours levels starting with 100 and ending with 0. Adding the keyword sorted re-orders the contours by increasing numerical value, which in this case would mean the first contour is drawn at 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，轮廓以指定的相反顺序（未排序）生成。因此，将cntrparam级别设置为0、10、100，将创建11个轮廓级别，从100开始，以0结尾。添加关键字sorted通过增加数值对轮廓重新排序，在这种情况下，这意味着第一个轮廓绘制为0 。

trans-unit.source: By default the first plot label is at the top of the key and successive labels are entered below it. The invert option causes the first label to be placed at the bottom of the key, with successive labels entered above it. This option is useful to force the vertical ordering of labels in the key to match the order of box types in a stacked histogram.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，第一个绘图标签位于键的顶部，并在其下方输入连续的标签。所述倒置选项使第一标签被放置在键的底部，与它上面输入连续标签。此选项用于强制键中标签的垂直顺序与堆叠直方图中的框类型顺序匹配。

trans-unit.source: By default the generated PostScript code uses language features that were introduced in PostScript Level 2, notably filters and pattern-fill of irregular objects such as filledcurves. PostScript Level 2 features are conditionally protected so that PostScript Level 1 interpreters do not issue errors but, rather, display a message or a PostScript Level 1 approximation. The level1 option substitutes PostScript Level 1 approximations of these features and uses no PostScript Level 2 code. This may be required by some old printers and old versions of Adobe Illustrator. The flag level1 can be toggled later by editing a single line in the PostScript output file to force PostScript Level 1 interpretation. In the case of files containing level 2 code, the above features will not appear or will be replaced by a note when this flag is set or when the interpreting program does not indicate that it understands level 2 PostScript or higher. The flag level3 enables PNG encoding for bitmapped images, which can reduce the output size considerably.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，生成的PostScript代码使用PostScript Level 2中引入的语言功能，特别是不规则对象（例如，filledcurves）的过滤器和模式填充。 PostScript Level 2功能受到有条件的保护，因此PostScript Level 1解释程序不会发出错误，而是显示一条消息或PostScript Level 1近似值。在1级选项替代PostScript语言级的这些特点1近似和不使用PostScript语言级2码。某些旧打印机和旧版本的Adobe Illustrator可能需要这样做。标志级别1以后可以通过在PostScript输出文件中编辑一行以强制执行PostScript Level 1解释来切换。如果文件包含2级代码，则在设置此标志或解释程序未指示其理解2级或更高级别的PostScript时，上述功能将不会出现或用注释代替。标志级别3启用了对位图图像的PNG编码，这可以显着减小输出大小。

trans-unit.source: By default the information written to the log file is also echoed to the terminal session. set fit quiet turns off the echo, whereas results prints only final results. brief gives one line summaries for every iteration of the fit in addition. verbose yields detailed iteration reports as it was the default before version 5.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，写入日志文件的信息也会回显到终端会话。设置“适合安静”可关闭回声，而结果仅显示最终结果。简要介绍了每次拟合拟合的摘要。verbose会生成详细的迭代报告，因为它是版本5之前的默认设置。

trans-unit.source: By default the key is built up one plot at a time. That is, the key symbol and title are drawn at the same time as the corresponding plot. That means newer plots may sometimes place elements on top of the key. set key opaque causes the key to be generated after all the plots. In this case the key area is filled with background color and then the key symbols and titles are written. Therefore the key itself may obscure portions of some plot elements. The default can be restored by set key noopaque.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，密钥一次建立一个图。即，关键符号和标题与对应的图同时绘制。这意味着更新的图有时可能会将元素放在键的顶部。设置关键点不透明会使关键点在所有绘图之后生成。在这种情况下，按键区域将填充背景色，然后写入按键符号和标题。因此，键本身可能会遮盖某些绘图元素的某些部分。可以通过设置noopaque恢复默认值。

trans-unit.source: By default the key is placed in the upper right inside corner of the graph. The keywords left, right, top, bottom, center, inside, outside, lmargin, rmargin, tmargin, bmargin (, above, over, below and under) may be used to automatically place the key in other positions of the graph. Also an at <position> may be given to indicate precisely where the plot should be placed. In this case, the keywords left, right, top, bottom and center serve an analogous purpose for alignment. For more information, see key placement.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，键位于图的右上角。关键字left，right，top，bottom，center，inside，outside，lmargin，rmargin，tmargin，bmargin（，上，上，下，下和下）可用于将关键字自动放置在图形的其他位置。还可以给出at <position>以精确指示应将绘图放置在何处。在这种情况下，剩下的关键字，右，顶部，底部和中心都用于对齐。有关更多信息，请参见按键位置。

trans-unit.source: By default the plot will inherit font settings from the embedding document. You have the option of forcing either Courier (cmtt) or Roman (cmr) fonts instead. In this case you may also specify a fontsize. Unless your driver is capable of building fonts at any size (e.g. dvips), stick to the standard 10, 11 and 12 point sizes.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,绘图将继承嵌入文档中的字体设置,您可以选择强制使用Courier(cmtt)或罗马(cmr)字体。您可以选择强制使用 Courier (cmtt)或 Roman (cmr)字体。在这种情况下,您还可以指定字体大小。除非您的驱动程序能够构建任何大小的字体(如dvips),否则请坚持使用标准的10、11和12点大小。

trans-unit.source: By default the quadrangles making up a pm3d solid surface are rendered in the order they are encountered along the surface grid points. This order may be controlled by the options scansautomatic|scansforward|scansbackward. These scan options are not in general compatible with hidden-surface removal.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，以pm3d实体表面为单位的四边形按照它们在表面网格点上遇到的顺序进行渲染。此顺序可能由选项scansautomatic | 前瞻 | 向后扫描。这些扫描选项通常与隐藏表面移除不兼容。

trans-unit.source: By default the sixel output uses 16 indexed colors. The truecolor option instead creates a TrueColor png image that is mapped down onto 256 colors in the output sixel image. Transparent fill styles require the truecolor option. See fillstyle. A transparent background is possible in either indexed or TrueColor images.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，sixel输出使用16种索引颜色。相反，truecolor选项创建一个TrueColor png图像，该图像向下映射到输出Sixel图像中的256种颜色。透明填充样式需要truecolor选项。参见fillstyle。在索引图像或TrueColor图像中都可以使用透明背景。

trans-unit.source: By default the size of the arrow head is reduced for very short arrows. This can be disabled using the fixed keyword after the size command.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，对于非常短的箭头，箭头的大小会减小。可以在size命令后使用fixed关键字禁用此功能。

trans-unit.source: By default the tikz terminal produces simple LaTeX arrows. To produce arrows in accord with gnuplot's 'arrowstyle' settings, use the 'gparrows' option. The 'tikzarrows' option is a third alternative that bypasses both of these. Instead the arrowstyle 'angle' parameter is used to index a set of 12 pre-defined TikZ arrow styles. E.g. an arrow style with the angle '7' will be mapped to the TikZ style 'gp arrow 7' ignoring all other arrowstyle settings.
trans-unit.target: 在默认情况下,tikz 终端会产生简单的 LaTeX 箭头,如果要产生符合 gnuplot'箭头样式'设置的箭头,请使用'gparrows'选项。要产生符合gnuplot'arrowstyle'设置的箭头,请使用'gparrows'选项。tikzarrows'选项是绕过这两个选项的第三个选择。取而代之的是arrowstyle的'角度'参数,用来索引一组12种预定义的TikZ箭头样式。例如,具有角度'7'的箭头样式将被映射到TikZ样式'gp箭头7',忽略所有其他箭头样式设置。

trans-unit.source: By default the vertical line segments have no crossbars at the top and bottom. If you want crossbars, which are typically used for box-and-whisker plots, then add the keyword whiskerbars to the plot command. By default these whiskerbars extend the full horizontal width of the candlestick, but you can modify this by specifying a fraction of the full width.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，垂直线段的顶部和底部没有交叉开关。如果要使用交叉开关（通常用于箱须图），则将关键字“ whiskerbars”添加到plot命令中。默认情况下，这些晶须会扩展烛台的整个水平宽度，但是您可以通过指定整个宽度的一部分来进行修改。

trans-unit.source: By default the whiskers extend from the ends of the box to the most distant point whose y value lies within 1.5 times the interquartile range. By default outliers are drawn as circles (point type 7). The width of the bars at the end of the whiskers may be controlled using set bars or set errorbars.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，晶须从盒子的两端延伸到最远的点，其y值位于四分位间距的1.5倍之内。默认情况下，离群值绘制为圆形（点类型7）。晶须末端的条的宽度可以使用设置条或设置错误条来控制。

trans-unit.source: By default, gnuplot assumes that the independent, or "dummy", variable for the plot command is "t" if in parametric or polar mode, or "x" otherwise. Similarly the independent variables for the splot command are "u" and "v" in parametric mode (splot cannot be used in polar mode), or "x" and "y" otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，gnuplot假定在参数或极性模式下，plot命令的独立变量或“虚拟”变量为“ t”，否则为“ x”。类似地，splot命令的自变量在参数模式下为“ u”和“ v”（在极性模式下不能使用splot），否则为“ x”和“ y”。

trans-unit.source: By default, gnuplot assumes the independent variable in polar graphs is in units of radians. If set angles degrees is specified before set polar, then the default range is [0:360] and the independent variable has units of degrees. This is particularly useful for plots of data files. The angle setting also applies to 3D mapping as set via the set mapping command.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，gnuplot假设极坐标图中的自变量以弧度为单位。如果在设置Polar之前指定了角度设置角度，则默认范围为[0：360]，并且自变量具有角度单位。这对于数据文件图特别有用。角度设置也适用于通过set mapping命令设置的3D映射。

trans-unit.source: By default, adjacent boxes are extended in width until they touch each other. A different default width may be specified using the set boxwidth command. Relative widths are interpreted as being a fraction of this default width.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，相邻的框的宽度会扩展到彼此接触为止。可以使用set boxwidth命令指定其他默认宽度。相对宽度被解释为该默认宽度的一部分。

trans-unit.source: By default, computed functions or data generated for the pseudo-file "+" are sampled over the entire range of the plot as set by a prior set xrange command, by an explicit global range specifier at the very start of the plot or splot command, or by autoscaling the xrange to span data seen in all the elements of this plot. However, individual plot components can be assigned a more restricted sampling range.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，由伪文件“ +”生成的计算函数或数据是在绘图的整个范围内采样的，该范围是由先前的set xrange命令设置的，在绘图或splot命令的最开始处由显式的全局范围说明符，或者通过自动缩放xrange来覆盖在该图的所有元素中看到的数据。但是，可以为各个绘图组件分配一个更受限制的采样范围。

trans-unit.source: By default, each function and data file will use a different line type and point type, up to the maximum number of available types. All terminal drivers support at least six different point types, and re-use them, in order, if more are required. To see the complete set of line and point types available for the current terminal, type test.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，每个函数和数据文件将使用不同的线型和点型，最多可用类型数。所有终端驱动程序至少支持六种不同的点类型，并在需要时按顺序重新使用它们。要查看当前端子可用的整套线和点类型，请输入test。

trans-unit.source: By default, each plot on the graph generates a corresponding entry in the key. This entry contains a plot title and a sample line/point/box of the same color and fill properties as used in the plot itself. The font and textcolor properties control the appearance of the individual plot titles that appear in the key. Setting the textcolor to "variable" causes the text for each key entry to be the same color as the line or fill color for that plot. This was the default in some earlier versions of gnuplot.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,图形上的每个情节都会在键中生成一个相应的条目。该条目包含一个绘图标题和一个样本线/点/框,其颜色和填充属性与绘图本身使用的相同。字体和 textcolor 属性控制了键中出现的各个情节标题的外观。将 textcolor 设置为 "可变 "会使每个键项的文本与该情节的线条或填充颜色相同。这是早期版本的gnuplot中的默认值。

trans-unit.source: By default, minor tics are off for linear axes and on for logarithmic axes. They inherit the settings for axis|border and {no}mirror specified for the major tics. Please see set xtics for information about these.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，线性轴的次要抽动关闭，对数轴的次要抽动关闭。它们继承了为主要镜头指定的axis | border和{no} mirror的设置。有关这些信息，请参阅set xtics。

trans-unit.source: By default, objects are clipped to the graph boundary unless one or more vertices are given in screen coordinates. Setting noclip will disable clipping to the graph boundary, but will still clip against the screen size.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，除非在屏幕坐标中给出一个或多个顶点，否则对象将被裁剪到图形边界。设置noclip将禁用裁剪到图形边界，但仍将裁剪屏幕大小。

trans-unit.source: By default, sampling is set to 100 points. A higher sampling rate will produce more accurate plots, but will take longer. This parameter has no effect on data file plotting unless one of the interpolation/approximation options is used. See plot smooth re 2D data and set cntrparam and set dgrid3d re 3D data.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，采样设置为100点。较高的采样率将产生更准确的绘图，但需要更长的时间。除非使用插值/逼近选项之一，否则此参数对数据文件绘图无效。请参见绘制平滑 2D数据并设置cntrparam和dgrid3d 3D数据。

trans-unit.source: By default, screens are displayed to the standard output. The set output command redirects the display to the specified file or device.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，屏幕显示为标准输出。该组输出命令重定向显示到指定的文件或装置。

trans-unit.source: By default, successive plots within the same graph will use successive linetypes from the default set for the current terminal type. However, choosing set style increment user allows you to step through the user-defined line styles rather than through the default linetypes.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，同一图形内的连续图将使用当前端子类型默认设置中的连续线型。但是，选择设置样式增量用户可以使您逐步浏览用户定义的线条样式，而不是通过默认的线型。

trans-unit.source: By default, the major diameter is interpreted in the units of the plot's horizontal axis (x or x2) while the minor diameter in that of the vertical (y or y2). This implies that if the x and y axis scales are not equal, then the major/minor diameter ratio will no longer be correct after rotation. This behavior can be changed with the units keyword, however.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，大直径以图的水平轴（x或x2）为单位，而小直径以垂直轴（y或y2）为单位。这意味着如果x和y轴比例不相等，则旋转后长径/短径比将不再正确。但是，可以使用units关键字更改此行为。

trans-unit.source: By default, the text is placed flush left against the point x,y,z. To adjust the way the label is positioned with respect to the point x,y,z, add the justification parameter, which may be left, right or center, indicating that the point is to be at the left, right or center of the text. Labels outside the plotted boundaries are permitted but may interfere with axis labels or other text.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，文本与点x，y，z齐平放置在左侧。要调整标签相对于点x，y，z的放置方式，请添加对齐参数，该参数可以为left，right或center，指示该点位于文本的左侧，右侧或中心。允许在绘制边界之外的标签，但可能会干扰轴标签或其他文本。

trans-unit.source: By default, the window is raised to the top of your desktop when a plot is drawn. This can be controlled with the keyword "raise". The keyword "persist" will prevent gnuplot from exiting before you explicitely close all the plot windows. Finally, by default the <space> key raises the gnuplot console window [MS Windows only], and 'q' closes the plot window. The keyword "ctrl" allows you to replace those bindings by <ctrl>+<space> and <ctrl>+'q'.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，绘制图形时，该窗口会升至桌面顶部。这可以通过关键字“ raise”来控制。关键字“ persist”将在您明确关闭所有绘图窗口之前阻止gnuplot退出。最后，默认情况下，<space>键将引发gnuplot控制台窗口（仅适用于MS Windows），而'q'将关闭绘图窗口。关键字“ ctrl”使您可以用<ctrl> + <space>和<ctrl> +'q'替换这些绑定。

trans-unit.source: By default, the window is raised to the top of your desktop when a plot is drawn. This can be controlled with the keyword "raise". The keyword "persist" will prevent gnuplot from exiting before you explicitely close all the plot windows. Finally, by default the key <space> raises the gnuplot console window, and 'q' closes the plot window. The keyword "ctrl" allows you to replace those bindings by <ctrl>+<space> and <ctrl>+'q', respectively. These three keywords (raise, persist and ctrl) can also be set and remembered between sessions through the configuration dialog.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，绘制图形时，该窗口会升至桌面顶部。这可以通过关键字“ raise”来控制。关键字“ persist”将在您明确关闭所有绘图窗口之前阻止gnuplot退出。最后，默认情况下，键<space>将引发gnuplot控制台窗口，而'q'将关闭绘图窗口。关键字“ ctrl”使您可以分别用<ctrl> + <space>和<ctrl> +'q'替换这些绑定。还可以通过配置对话框在会话之间设置和记住这三个关键字（raise，persist和ctrl）。

trans-unit.source: By default, these options are off. The selected zero axis is drawn with a line of type <line_type>, width <line_width>, color <colorspec>, and dash type <dashtype> (if supported by the terminal driver currently in use), or a user-defined style <line_style> (see set style line).
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，这些选项是关闭的。选定的零轴绘制为以下类型的线：<line_type>类型，宽度<line_width>，颜色<colorspec>和破折号类型<dashtype>（如果当前使用的终端驱动程序支持）或用户定义的样式< line_style>（请参阅设置样式行）。

trans-unit.source: By default, tic labels are justified automatically depending on the axis and rotation angle to produce aesthetically pleasing results. If this is not desired, justification can be overridden with an explicit left, right or center keyword. autojustify restores the default behavior.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，tic标签会根据轴和旋转角度自动对齐，以产生美观的结果。如果不希望这样做，则可以使用显式的left，right或center关键字覆盖对齐方式。自动调整可恢复默认行为。

trans-unit.source: By specifying noaltdiagonal, you can override the default handling of a special case can occur if undefined is active (i.e. <level> is not 3). Each cell of the grid-structured input surface will be divided in two triangles along one of its diagonals. Normally, all these diagonals have the same orientation relative to the grid. If exactly one of the four cell corners is excluded by the undefined handler, and this is on the usual diagonal, both triangles will be excluded. However if the default setting of altdiagonal is active, the other diagonal will be chosen for this cell instead, minimizing the size of the hole in the surface.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定noaltdiagonal，您可以覆盖未定义处于活动状态（即<level>不是3）时可能发生的特殊情况的默认处理。网格结构输入表面的每个像元将沿其对角线之一分成两个三角形。通常，所有这些对角线相对于网格具有相同的方向。如果未定义的处理程序恰好排除了四个单元角中的一个，并且位于通常的对角线上，则两个三角形都将被排除。但是，如果altdiagonal的默认设置处于活动状态，则将为此单元格选择另一个对角线，以最小化曲面中的孔的大小。

trans-unit.source: By this method, only text fonts are changed. If you also want to change the math fonts you have to use the "gnuplot.cfg" file or the header option, described below.
trans-unit.target: 通过这种方法，仅文本字体被更改。如果您还想更改数学字体，则必须使用“ gnuplot.cfg”文件或标题选项，如下所述。

trans-unit.source: By using the 'externalimages' option all bitmap images will be written as external PNG images and included at compile time of the document. Generating DVI and later postscript files requires to convert the PNGs into EPS files in a separate step e.g. by using ImageMagick's convert. Transparent bitmap images are always generated as an external PNGs.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用“ externalimages”选项，所有位图图像都将被写入为外部PNG图像，并在文档编译时包含在内。生成DVI和更高版本的Postscript文件要求在单独的步骤中将PNG转换为EPS文件，例如，使用ImageMagick的convert。透明位图图像始终作为外部PNG生成。

trans-unit.source: Changing font sizes in TeX has no effect on the size of mathematics, and there is no foolproof way to make such a change, except by globally setting a magnification factor. This is the purpose of the magnification option. It must be followed by a scaling factor. All text (NOT the graphs) will be scaled by this factor. Use this if you have math that you want at some size other than the default 10pt. Unfortunately, all math will be the same size, but see the discussion below on editing the MP output. mag will also work under notex but there seems no point in using it as the font size option (below) works as well.
trans-unit.target: 在TeX中更改字体大小不会影响数学大小，并且除非通过全局设置放大倍数，否则就没有万无一失的方法来进行此类更改。这是放大选项的目的。它后面必须有一个比例因子。所有文本（非图形）将按此比例缩放。如果您想要的数学数值不是默认的10pt，请使用此格式。不幸的是，所有数学运算的大小都是相同的，但是请参见下面有关编辑MP输出的讨论。mag也可以在notex下工作，但是使用它似乎没有意义，因为字体大小选项（如下）也可以工作。

trans-unit.source: Character
trans-unit.target: Character

trans-unit.source: Choose the option labels to define persistent gnuplot labels using Button 2. The default is nolabels, which makes Button 2 draw only a temporary label at the mouse position. Labels are drawn with the current setting of mouseformat. The labeloptions string is passed to the set label command. The default is "point pointstyle 1" which will plot a small plus at the label position. Temporary labels will disappear at the next replot or mouse zoom operation. Persistent labels can be removed by holding the Ctrl-Key down while clicking Button 2 on the label's point. The threshold for how close you must be to the label is also determined by the pointsize.
trans-unit.target: 选择选项标签以使用Button 2定义持久性gnuplot标签。默认值为nolabels，这使Button 2仅在鼠标位置绘制一个临时标签。标签是使用mouseformat的当前设置绘制的。该labeloptions字符串传递到集标签命令。默认值为“ point pointstyle 1”，它将在标签位置绘制一个小加号。临时标签将在下次重新绘制或鼠标缩放操作时消失。按住Ctrl键的同时单击标签点上的按钮2，可以删除持久标签。你必须在标签的接近阈值也由确定的pointsize。

trans-unit.source: Colons are used to separate extrema in range specifications (whether they are given on set, plot or splot commands) and to separate entries in the using filter of the plot, replot, splot and fit commands.
trans-unit.target: 冒号被用来在独立的极值范围规格（无论它们是在给定的组，情节或splot命令），并在单独的条目使用的过滤器的情节，重制，splot和配合命令。

trans-unit.source: Color
trans-unit.target: Color

trans-unit.source: Color box
trans-unit.target: 彩盒

trans-unit.source: Color box position can be default or user. If the latter is specified the values as given with the origin and size subcommands are used. The box can be drawn after (front) or before (back) the graph or the surface.
trans-unit.target: 颜色框的位置可以是默认位置或用户位置。如果指定了后者，则使用由origin和size子命令给定的值。可以在图形或表面之后（正面）或之前（背面）绘制框。

trans-unit.source: Color palettes require terminal entries for filled color polygons and palettes of smooth colors, are currently available for terminals listed in help for set pm3d. The range of color values are adjustable independently by set cbrange and set log cb. The whole color palette is visualized in the colorbox.
trans-unit.target: 调色板要求终端输入用于填充的颜色多边形和平滑颜色的调色板，当前可用于set pm3d的帮助中列出的终端。颜色值的范围可通过设置cbrange和设置log cb独立调整。整个调色板在colorbox中可见。

trans-unit.source: Color surface can be drawn at the base or top (then it is a gray/color planar map) or at z-coordinates of surface points (gray/color surface). This is defined by the at option with a string of up to 6 combinations of b, t and s. For instance, at b plots at bottom only, at st plots firstly surface and then top map, while at bstbst will never by seriously used.
trans-unit.target: 可以在底部或顶部（然后是灰色/彩色平面图）或表面点的z坐标（灰色/彩色表面）绘制彩色表面。这由at选项定义，该字符串最多包含b，t和s的 6个组合。例如，仅在底部的b地块，在st的地块首先是地表，然后是顶部的地块，而在bstbst则永远不会认真使用。

trans-unit.source: Color_assignment
trans-unit.target: Color_assignment

trans-unit.source: Color_resources
trans-unit.target: Color_resources

trans-unit.source: Colored quadrangles are plotted one after another. When plotting surfaces (at s), the later quadrangles overlap (overdraw) the previous ones. (Gnuplot is not virtual reality tool to calculate intersections of filled polygon meshes.) You may try to switch between scansforward and scansbackward to force the first scan of the data to be plotted first or last. The default is scansautomatic where gnuplot makes a guess about scans order. On the other hand, the depthorder option completely reorders the quadrangles. The rendering is performed after a depth sorting, which allows to visualize even complicated surfaces; see pm3d depthorder for more details.
trans-unit.target: 彩色的四边形一个接一个地绘制。在绘制曲面时（在s处），后面的四边形重叠（覆盖）前面的四边形。 （Gnuplot不是用于计算填充的多边形网格的相交的虚拟现实工具。）您可以尝试在正向扫描和向后扫描之间切换，以强制对数据的第一次扫描进行第一个或最后一个绘制。默认值为scansautomatic，其中gnuplot猜测扫描顺序。另一方面，depthorder选项完全重新排列四边形。渲染是在深度排序之后执行的，从而可以可视化甚至复杂的表面；有关更多详细信息，请参见pm3d depthorder。

trans-unit.target: Colorspec背景色

trans-unit.target: Colorspec Rgbcolor变量

trans-unit.source: Command set view map is used to represent the drawing as a map. It is useful for contour plots or 2D heatmaps using pm3d mode rather than with image. In the latter case, take care that you properly use zrange and cbrange for input data point filtering and color range scaling, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 命令集视图地图用于将图形表示为地图。对于使用pm3d模式而不是image的等高线图或2D热图很有用。在后一种情况下，请注意分别将zrange和cbrange分别用于输入数据点过滤和颜色范围缩放。

trans-unit.source: Command line keywords may be used to override settings extracted from the file. The settings from the file override any defaults. See set datafile binary.
trans-unit.target: 命令行关键字可用于覆盖从文件中提取的设置。文件中的设置将覆盖所有默认设置。请参阅set datafile binary。

trans-unit.source: Command-line Editing Commands
trans-unit.target: 命令行编辑命令

trans-unit.source: Command-line editing and command history are supported using either an external gnu readline library, an external BSD libedit library, or a built-in equivalent. This choice is a configuration option at the time gnuplot is built.
trans-unit.target: 支持使用外部的gnu readline库、外部的BSD libedit库或内置的等效库进行命令行编辑和命令历史记录。这个选择是在构建gnuplot时的一个配置选项。

trans-unit.source: Command-line substitution can be used anywhere on the gnuplot command line, except inside strings delimited by single quotes.
trans-unit.target: 命令行替换可以在gnuplot命令行上的任何地方使用，但用单引号引起来的字符串内部除外。

trans-unit.source: Command-line substitution is specified by a system command enclosed in backquotes. This command is spawned and the output it produces replaces the backquoted text on the command line. Exit status of the system command is returned in variables GPVAL_SYSTEM_ERRNO and GPVAL_SYSTEM_ERRMSG.
trans-unit.target: 命令行替换是由一个用反引号括起来的系统命令来指定的。这个命令会被生成,它产生的输出会替换命令行上的反引号文本。系统命令的退出状态在变量GPVAL_SYSTEM_ERRNO和GPVAL_SYSTEM_ERRMSG中返回。

trans-unit.source: Command-line-editing
trans-unit.target: Command-line-editing

trans-unit.target: Command-line_options

trans-unit.source: Commands
trans-unit.target: Commands

trans-unit.source: Commands like show xrange will re-interpret the integer according to timefmt. If you change timefmt, and then show the quantity again, it will be displayed in the new timefmt. For that matter, if you reset the data type flag for that axis (e.g. set xdata), the quantity will be shown in its numerical form.
trans-unit.target: 诸如show xrange之类的命令将根据timefmt重新解释整数。如果更改timefmt，然后再次显示数量，它将显示在新的timefmt中。为此，如果您重置该轴的数据类型标志（例如set xdata），则数量将以其数字形式显示。

trans-unit.source: Commas are used to separate coordinates on the set commands arrow, key, and label; the list of variables being fitted (the list after the via keyword on the fit command); lists of discrete contours or the loop parameters which specify them on the set cntrparam command; the arguments of the set commands dgrid3d, dummy, isosamples, offsets, origin, samples, size, time, and view; lists of tics or the loop parameters which specify them; the offsets for titles and axis labels; parametric functions to be used to calculate the x, y, and z coordinates on the plot, replot and splot commands; and the complete sets of keywords specifying individual plots (data sets or functions) on the plot, replot and splot commands.
trans-unit.target: 使用逗号，在单独的坐标组的命令箭头，键，和标签 ;拟合的变量列表（fit命令中via关键字之后的列表）；在set cntrparam命令中指定离散轮廓或循环参数的列表；设置命令dgrid3d的参数，dummy，isosamples，offset，origin，sample，size，time和view; tic列表或指定它们的循环参数；标题和轴标签的偏移量；参数函数被用于计算X，Y，和在z坐标情节，重制和splot命令; 和成套指定在各个图（数据集或功能）的关键字情节，重制和splot命令。

trans-unit.source: Complex constants are expressed as {<real>,<imag>}, where <real> and <imag> must be numerical constants. For example, {3,2} represents 3 + 2i; {0,1} represents 'i' itself. The curly braces are explicitly required here.
trans-unit.target: 复数常量表示为{<real>，<imag>}，其中<real>和<imag>必须是数字常量。例如，{3,2}表示3 + 2i；{0,1}代表“ i”本身。在这里明确需要花括号。

trans-unit.source: Computed functions or data generated for the pseudo-file '++' use samples generated along the u and v axes. This is a CHANGE from versions prior to 5.2 which sampled along the x and y axes. See special-filenames ++. 2D sampling can be used in either plot or splot commands.
trans-unit.target: 为伪文件“ ++”生成的计算函数或数据使用沿u和v轴生成的样本。这是从5.2之前的版本沿x和y轴采样的更改。请参阅特殊文件名++。2D采样可用于绘图或绘图命令。

trans-unit.source: ConTeXt is a macro package for TeX, highly integrated with Metapost (for drawing figures) and intended for creation of high-quality PDF documents. The terminal outputs Metafun source, which can be edited manually, but you should be able to configure most things from outside.
trans-unit.target: ConTeXt是一个用于TeX的宏包,与Metapost(用于绘制图形)高度集成,用于创建高质量的PDF文档。终端输出Metafun源,可以手动编辑,但你应该能够从外部配置大部分东西。

trans-unit.source: DEPRECATED (will be removed in next gnuplot release). The linux driver has no additional options to specify. It looks at the environment variable GSVGAMODE for the default mode; if not set, it uses 1024x768x256 as default mode or, if that is not possible, 640x480x16 (standard VGA).

trans-unit.target: 不推荐使用（将在下一个gnuplot版本中删除）。该vgagl驱动程序与完整的鼠标和pm3d支持快速的Linux控制台驱动。它查看默认模式的环境变量SVGALIB_DEFAULT_MODE。如果未设置，则使用具有最高可用分辨率的256色模式。

trans-unit.source: Data block names must begin with a $ character, which distinguishes them from other types of persistent variables. The end-of-data delimiter (EOD in the example) may be any sequence of alphanumeric characters.
trans-unit.target: 数据块的名称必须以$字符开头,以区别于其他类型的持久性变量。数据末尾定界符(本例中的EOD)可以是任何字母数字字符序列。

trans-unit.source: Data error estimates are used to calculate the relative weight of each data point when determining the weighted sum of squared residuals, WSSR or chisquare. They can affect the parameter estimates, since they determine how much influence the deviation of each data point from the fitted function has on the final values. Some of the fit output information, including the parameter error estimates, is more meaningful if accurate data error estimates have been provided.
trans-unit.target: 在确定平方残差，WSSR或卡方的加权总和时，数据误差估计用于计算每个数据点的相对权重。它们可以影响参数估计，因为它们确定每个数据点与拟合函数的偏差对最终值的影响有多大。如果提供了准确的数据误差估计，则某些拟合输出信息（包括参数误差估计）将更有意义。

trans-unit.source: Data file organization is essentially the same as for plot, except that each point is an (x,y,z) triple. If only a single value is provided, it will be used for z, the block number will be used for y, and the index of the data point in the block will be used for x. If two or four values are provided, gnuplot uses the last value for calculating the color in pm3d plots. Three values are interpreted as an (x,y,z) triple. Additional values are generally used as errors, which can be used by fit.
trans-unit.target: 数据文件的组织结构与plot基本上相同，不同之处在于每个点都是（x，y，z）三元组。如果仅提供单个值，则它将用于z，块号将用于y，块中数据点的索引将用于x。如果提供两个或四个值，gnuplot将使用最后一个值来计算pm3d图中的颜色。三个值被解释为（x，y，z）三元组。附加值通常用作错误，可以通过fit来使用。

trans-unit.source: Data files are plotted as before, except any preceding parametric function must be fully specified before a data file is given as a plot. In other words, the x parametric function (sin(t) above) and the y parametric function (t**2 above) must not be interrupted with any modifiers or data functions; doing so will generate a syntax error stating that the parametric function is not fully specified.
trans-unit.target: 像以前一样绘制数据文件，除了在将数据文件作为图形给出之前必须完全指定任何先前的参数函数。换句话说，x参数函数（上面的sin（t））和y参数函数（上面的t ** 2）一定不能被任何修饰符或数据函数打断。这样做会产生语法错误，指出未完全指定参数函数。

trans-unit.source: Data files may contain string data consisting of either an arbitrary string of printable characters containing no whitespace or an arbitrary string of characters, possibly including whitespace, delimited by double quotes. The following line from a datafile is interpreted to contain four columns, with a text field in column 3:
trans-unit.target: 数据文件可以包含字符串数据,由任意的可打印字符串组成,不含空格,或者由任意的字符串组成,可能包括空格,用双引号分隔。数据文件的以下一行被解释为包含四列,第3列为文本字段:

trans-unit.source: Data files should contain at least one data point per record (using can select one data point from the record). Records beginning with # (and also with ! on VMS) will be treated as comments and ignored. Each data point represents an (x,y) pair. For plots with error bars or error bars with lines (see errorbars or errorlines), each data point is (x,y,ydelta), (x,y,ylow,yhigh), (x,y,xdelta), (x,y,xlow,xhigh), or (x,y,xlow,xhigh,ylow,yhigh).
trans-unit.target: 数据文件每条记录应至少包含一个数据点（使用可以从记录中选择一个数据点）。以＃开头（在VMS上也以！开头）的记录将被视为注释并被忽略。每个数据点代表一个（x，y）对。对于积 s的误差棒或误差线用线（参见errorbars或errorlines），每个数据点是（X，Y，ydelta），（X，Y，ylow，yhigh），（X，Y，xdelta），（X ，y，xlow，xhigh）或（x，y，xlow，xhigh，ylow，yhigh）。

trans-unit.source: Data may be written in exponential format with the exponent preceded by the letter e or E. The fortran exponential specifiers d, D, q, and Q may also be used if the command set datafile fortran is in effect.
trans-unit.target: 数据可以以指数格式写入，指数后面带有字母e或E。如果命令集数据文件fortran有效，则也可以使用fortran指数说明符d，D，q和Q。

trans-unit.source: Data points whose center lies inside the plot boundaries are normally drawn even if the finite size of the point symbol causes it to extend past a boundary line. set clip points causes such points to be clipped (i.e. not drawn) even though the point center is inside the boundaries of a 2D plot. Data points whose center lies outside the plot boundaries are never drawn.
trans-unit.target: 即使点符号的有限大小导致其延伸超出边界线，通常也会绘制其中心位于绘图边界内的数据点。设置裁剪点会导致此类点被裁剪（即，未绘制），即使点中心在2D图的边界内。永远不会绘制中心位于绘图边界之外的数据点。

trans-unit.source: Data sets are separated by pairs of blank records. index <m> selects only set <m>; index <m>:<n> selects sets in the range <m> to <n>; and index <m>:<n>:<p> selects indices <m>, <m>+<p>, <m>+2<p>, etc., but stopping at <n>. Following C indexing, the index 0 is assigned to the first data set in the file. Specifying too large an index results in an error message. If <p> is specified but <n> is left blank then every <p>-th dataset is read until the end of the file. If index is not specified, the entire file is plotted as a single data set.
trans-unit.target: 数据集由成对的空白记录分隔。索引<m>仅选择集合<m>；索引<m>：<n>在范围<m>至<n>中选择集合；和索引<m>：<n>：<p>选择索引<m>，<m> + <p>，<m> +2 <p>等，但停在<n>。在C索引之后，索引0被分配给文件中的第一个数据集。指定太大的索引会导致错误消息。如果指定了<p>，但<n>留为空白，则将读取每个<p>数据集，直到文件末尾。如果未指定index，则将整个文件绘制为单个数据集。

trans-unit.source: Data style
trans-unit.target: 数据风格

trans-unit.source: Data values are sorted to find the median and quartile boundaries. If the total number of points N is odd, then the median value is taken as the value of data point (N+1)/2. If N is even, then the median is reported as the mean value of points N/2 and (N+2)/2. Equivalent treatment is used for the quartile boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 对数据值进行排序,找出中位数和四分位数的边界。如果总点数N是奇数,那么中值就取数据点(N+1)/2的值。如果N为偶数,则中位数报为点N/2和(N+2)/2的平均值。四分位数边界采用等效处理。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the terminal and libcaca backend, only 8 different background colors might be supported. Bright colors (with the most most significant bit of the background color set) are then interpreted as indicator for blinking text. Try using background rgb "gray" in that case.

trans-unit.source: Deprecated_options

trans-unit.source: Describes the sampling array dimensions associated with the binary file. The coordinates will be generated by gnuplot. A number must be specified for each dimension of the array. For example, array=(10,20) means the underlying sampling structure is two-dimensional with 10 points along the first (x) dimension and 20 points along the second (y) dimension. A negative number indicates that data should be read until the end of file. If there is only one dimension, the parentheses may be omitted. A colon can be used to separate the dimensions for multiple records. For example, array=25:35 indicates there are two one-dimensional records in the file.
trans-unit.target: 描述与二进制文件关联的采样数组维度。坐标将由gnuplot生成。必须为数组的每个维指定一个数字。例如，array =（10,20）表示基础采样结构是二维的，沿第一个（x）维有10个点，沿第二个（y）维有20个点。负数表示应该读取数据直到文件末尾。如果只有一维，则可以省略括号。冒号可用于分隔多个记录的维。例如，array = 25：35表示文件中有两个一维记录。

trans-unit.source: Duplexing in PostScript is the ability of the printer to print on both sides of the same sheet of paper. With defaultplex, the default setting of the printer is used; with simplex only one side is printed; duplex prints on both sides (ignored if your printer can't do it).
trans-unit.target: PostScript中的双面打印是打印机在同一张纸的两面进行打印的能力。对于defaultplex，使用打印机的默认设置。与单纯只在一侧被印刷; 双面打印（如果您的打印机无法打印则忽略）。
