trans-unit.source: EXPERIMENTAL (implementation details may change): Text of the form "image{<xsize>,<ysize>}:<filename>{ \n<caption text>}" will trigger display of the image file in a pop-up box. The optional size overrides a default box size 300x200. The types of image file recognized may vary by terminal type, but *.png should always work. Any additional text lines following the image filename are displayed as usual for hypertext. Example:
trans-unit.target: 实验（实现的详细信息可能会更改）：“ image {<xsize>，<ysize>}：<filename> {\ n <caption text>}”形式的文本将在弹出框中触发图像文件的显示。可选尺寸会覆盖默认的框尺寸300x200。识别的图像文件类型可能会因终端类型而异，但是* .png应该始终有效。图像文件名后的所有其他文本行将像往常一样显示超文本。例：

trans-unit.source: Each <entry> may be a simple column number that selects the value from one field of the input file, a string that matches a column label in the first line of a data set, an expression enclosed in parentheses, or a special function not enclosed in parentheses such as xticlabels(2).
trans-unit.target: 每个<entry>可以是从输入文件的一个字段中选择值的简单列号，与数据集第一行中的列标签匹配的字符串，包含在括号中的表达式或未包含的特殊函数放在括号中，例如xticlabels（2）。

trans-unit.source: Each <system> can either be first, second, polar, graph, screen, or character.
trans-unit.target: 每个<system>可以是first，second，polar，graph，screen或character。

trans-unit.source: Each PostScript output file includes a %%Prolog section and possibly some additional user-defined sections containing, for example, character encodings. These sections are copied from a set of PostScript prologue files that are either compiled into the gnuplot executable or stored elsewhere on your computer. A default directory where these files live is set at the time gnuplot is built. However, you can override this default either by using the gnuplot command set psdir or by defining an environment variable GNUPLOT_PS_DIR. See set psdir.
trans-unit.target: 每个PostScript输出文件都包含%% Prolog部分，并可能包含一些其他用户定义的部分，例如，包含字符编码。这些部分是从一组PostScript序言文件中复制的，这些PostScript序言文件被编译为gnuplot可执行文件或存储在计算机的其他位置。在生成gnuplot时设置这些文件所在的默认目录。但是，您可以通过使用gnuplot命令集psdir或定义环境变量GNUPLOT_PS_DIR 来覆盖此默认设置。参见set psdir。

trans-unit.source: Each cluster of boxes is derived from a single row of the input data file. It is common in such input files that the first element of each row is a label. Labels from this column may be placed along the x-axis underneath the appropriate cluster of boxes with the xticlabels option to using.
trans-unit.target: 每个盒子簇都来自输入数据文件的一行。在此类输入文件中，通常每行的第一个元素是标签。可以使用xticlabels选项使用将该列中的标签沿x轴放置在相应的框类下方。

trans-unit.source: Each fit iteration will display information which can be used to evaluate the progress of the fit. (An '*' indicates that it did not find a smaller WSSR and is trying again.) The 'sum of squares of residuals', also called 'chisquare', is the WSSR between the data and your fitted function; fit has minimized that. At this stage, with weighted data, chisquare is expected to approach the number of degrees of freedom (data points minus parameters). The WSSR can be used to calculate the reduced chisquare (WSSR/ndf) or stdfit, the standard deviation of the fit, sqrt(WSSR/ndf). Both of these are reported for the final WSSR.
trans-unit.target: 每次拟合迭代将显示可用于评估拟合进度的信息。 （“ *”表示未找到较小的WSSR，正在重试。）“残差平方和”（也称为“ chisquare”）是数据与拟合函数之间的WSSR；合身已将其最小化。在此阶段，对于加权数据，卡方估计接近自由度（数据点减去参数）的数量。 WSSR可用于计算精简卡方（WSSR / ndf）或标准拟合标准差sqrt（WSSR / ndf）。两者都在最终的WSSR中报告。

trans-unit.source: Each function definition is made available as a special string-valued variable with the prefix 'GPFUN_'.
trans-unit.target: 每个函数定义都是作为一个特殊的字符串值变量,前缀为'GPFUN_'。

trans-unit.source: Each function surface plot will have <iso_1> iso-u lines and <iso_2> iso-v lines. If you only specify <iso_1>, <iso_2> will be set to the same value as <iso_1>. By default, sampling is set to 10 isolines per u or v axis. A higher sampling rate will produce more accurate plots, but will take longer. These parameters have no effect on data file plotting.
trans-unit.target: 每个功能表面图将具有<iso_1> iso-u线和<iso_2> iso-v线。如果仅指定<iso_1>，则<iso_2>将设置为与<iso_1>相同的值。默认情况下，每个u或v轴的采样设置为10个等值线。较高的采样率将产生更准确的绘图，但需要更长的时间。这些参数对数据文件绘图没有影响。

trans-unit.source: Each offset may be a constant or an expression. Each defaults to 0. By default, the left and right offsets are given in units of the first x axis, the top and bottom offsets in units of the first y axis. Alternatively, you may specify the offsets as a fraction of the total axis range by using the keyword "graph". A positive offset expands the axis range in the specified direction, e.g., a positive bottom offset makes ymin more negative. Negative offsets, while permitted, can have unexpected interactions with autoscaling and clipping. To prevent the auto-scaling from further adjusting your axis ranges, it is useful to also specify "set auto fix".
trans-unit.target: 每个偏移量可以是一个常数或一个表达式,每个偏移量的默认值为0。默认情况下,左右偏移量以第一个X轴为单位,顶部和底部偏移量以第一个Y轴为单位。另外,您也可以使用关键字 "图形 "将偏移量指定为总轴范围的一部分。正的偏移量会在指定的方向上扩大轴的范围,例如,正的底部偏移量会使ymin更负。负偏移虽然是允许的,但可能会与自动缩放和剪切产生意想不到的相互作用。为了防止自动缩放进一步调整您的轴范围,还可以指定 "设置自动固定"。

trans-unit.source: Each picture you made is in a separate file. The first picture is in, e.g., figure.0, the second in figure.1, and so on.... To place the third picture in your document, for example, all you have to do is:
trans-unit.target: 你做的每张图片都在一个单独的文件中。第一张图片在图0中,第二张在图1中,以此类推......。例如,要把第三张图片放在你的文件中,你所要做的就是。

trans-unit.source: Each picture you made is stored in a single character. The first picture is character 0, the second is character 1, and so on... After doing the above step, you can use the pictures just like any other characters. Therefore, to place pictures 1 and 2 centered in your document, all you have to do is:
trans-unit.target: 你所做的每一张图片都会被储存在一个字符中。第一张图片是字符0,第二张是字符1,以此类推......完成上述步骤后,您可以像使用其他字符一样使用图片。因此,要把图片1和2放在文档的中心位置,你要做的就是。

trans-unit.source: Each pixel (data point) of the input 2D image will become a rectangle or parallelipiped in the plot. The coordinates of each data point will determine the center of the parallelipiped. That is, an M x N set of data will form an image with M x N pixels. This is different from the pm3d plotting style, where an M x N set of data will form a surface of (M-1) x (N-1) elements. The scan directions for a binary image data grid can be further controlled by additional keywords. See binary keywords flipx, keywords center, and keywords rotate.
trans-unit.target: 输入的2D图像的每个像素（数据点）将变为矩形或在图中平行化。每个数据点的坐标将确定被平行的点的中心。即，M×N个数据集将形成具有M×N个像素的图像。这与pm3d绘图样式不同，后者的M x N数据集将形成（M-1）x（N-1）个元素的表面。二进制图像数据网格的扫描方向可以通过其他关键字进一步控制。请参阅二进制关键字flipx，关键字中心和关键字旋转。

trans-unit.source: Each plot can be scaled by scale and shifted with offset; if the y-values for scale or offset are omitted, the x-value will be used. unset multiplot will turn off the automatic layout and restore the values of set size and set origin as they were before set multiplot layout.
trans-unit.target: 每个图都可以按比例缩放并随偏移量移动;如果省略了比例或偏移量的y值，则将使用x值。unset multiplot将关闭自动布局，并恢复设置大小和设置原点的值，就像设置multiplot布局之前一样。

trans-unit.source: Each plot element consists of a definition, a function, or a data source together with optional properties or modifiers:
trans-unit.target: 每个绘图元素都由一个定义、一个函数或一个数据源以及可选的属性或修饰符组成。

trans-unit.source: Each plot is represented in the key by a single line containing a line or symbol or shape representing the plot style and a corresponding title. Using the keyword notitle in the plot command will suppress generation of the line. Contour plots generated additional entries in the key, one for each contour (see cntrlabel). You can add extra lines to the key by inserting a dummy plot command that uses the keyword keyentry rather than a filename or a function. See keyentry.
trans-unit.target: 每个图在键中由单行表示，其中包含代表图样式和相应标题的线或符号或形状。在plot命令中使用关键字notitle将抑制行的生成。等高线图在键中生成了其他项，每个等高线项一个（请参阅cntrlabel）。通过插入使用关键字keyentry而不是文件名或函数的虚拟绘图命令，可以向键添加额外的行。请参阅keyentry。

trans-unit.source: Each set of non-blank characters in the timedata counts as one column in the using n:n specification. Thus 11:11 25/12/76 21.0 consists of three columns. To avoid confusion, gnuplot requires that you provide a complete using specification if your file contains timedata.
trans-unit.target: 时间数据中的每个非空白字符集在使用n：n规范中均计为一列。因此11:11 25/12/76 21.0由三列组成。为避免混淆，如果文件包含时间数据，gnuplot要求您提供完整的使用规范。

trans-unit.source: Each terminal has a default set of arrow and point types, which can be seen by using the command test. set style arrow defines a set of arrow types and widths and point types and sizes so that you can refer to them later by an index instead of repeating all the information at each invocation.
trans-unit.target: 每个终端都有一组默认的箭头和点类型，可以使用命令test看到。set style arrow定义了一组箭头类型和宽度以及点类型和大小，以便您以后可以通过索引引用它们，而不必在每次调用时重复所有信息。

trans-unit.source: Each terminal has a default set of line and point types, which can be seen by using the command test. set style line defines a set of line types and widths and point types and sizes so that you can refer to them later by an index instead of repeating all the information at each invocation.
trans-unit.target: 每个端子都有一组默认的线型和点型，可以通过使用命令test看到。set style line定义了一组线型和宽度以及点型和大小，以便您以后可以通过索引引用它们，而不必在每次调用时重复所有信息。

trans-unit.source: Each time you issue one of these four commands it will redraw the screen or generate a new page of output containing all of the currently defined axes, labels, titles, and all of the various functions or data sources listed in the original plot command. If instead you need to place several complete plots next to each other on the same page, e.g. to make a panel of sub-figures or to inset a small plot inside a larger plot, use the command set multiplot to suppress generation of a new page for each plot command.
trans-unit.target: 每次发出这四个命令之一时，它将重新绘制屏幕或生成新的输出页面，其中包含所有当前定义的轴，标签，标题以及原始plot命令中列出的所有各种功能或数据源。相反，如果您需要在同一页面上相邻放置多个完整图，例如要制作一个子图面板或在较大图内插入一个小图，请使用命令set multiplot禁止生成新页面对于每个绘图命令。

trans-unit.source: Either by three numbers (each in [0,1]) for red, green and blue, separated by whitespace, or the name of the color in quotes or X style color specifiers also in quotes. You may freely mix the three types in a gradient definition, but the named color "red" will be something strange if RGB is not selected as color space. Use show colornames for a list of known color names.
trans-unit.target: 红色，绿色和蓝色用三个数字（每个在[0,1]中），用空格隔开，或者用引号引起的颜色名称或用引号引起的X样式颜色说明符。您可以随意在渐变定义中混合使用这三种类型，但是如果未选择RGB作为颜色空间，则命名的颜色“红色”会有些奇怪。使用show colornames获得已知颜色名称的列表。

trans-unit.source: Elements within the key are stacked according to vertical or horizontal. In the case of vertical, the key occupies as few columns as possible. That is, elements are aligned in a column until running out of vertical space at which point a new column is started. The vertical space may be limited using 'maxrows'. In the case of horizontal, the key occupies as few rows as possible. The horizontal space may be limited using 'maxcols'.
trans-unit.target: 键中的元素根据垂直或水平堆叠。在Vertical的情况下，键占用的列越少越好。也就是说，元素在列中对齐，直到耗尽垂直空间为止，此时新列开始。垂直空间可以使用“最大行数”来限制。在水平情况下，键占用的行越少越好。可以使用“ maxcols”限制水平空间。

trans-unit.source: Examples: Suppose that the input file contains data values in columns 2, 4, 6, ... and error estimates in columns 3, 5, 7, ... This example plots the values in columns 2 and 4 as a histogram of clustered boxes (the default style). Because we use iteration in the plot command, any number of data columns can be handled in a single command. See plot for.
trans-unit.target: 示例：假设输入文件包含第2、4、6，...列中的数据值和第3、5、7，...列中的错误估计，本示例将第2和4列中的值绘制为聚类的直方图框（默认样式）。因为我们在plot命令中使用迭代，所以可以在一个命令中处理任意数量的数据列。请参阅情节。

trans-unit.source: Examples: The first example illustrates nesting one bracketed clause inside another to produce a boldface A with an italic subscript i, all in the current font. If the clause introduced by :Normal were omitted the subscript would be both italic and boldface. The second example illustrates the same markup applied to font "Times New Roman" at 20 point size.

trans-unit.source: Fence plots
trans-unit.target: 栅栏地块

trans-unit.source: Fence plots combine several 2D plots by aligning their Y coordinates and separating them from each other by a displacement along X. Filling the area between a base value and each plot's series of Z values enhances the visual impact of the alignment on Y and comparison on Z. There are several ways such plots can be created in gnuplot. The simplest is to use the 5 column variant of the zerrorfill style. Suppose there are separate curves z = Fi(y) indexed by i. A fence plot is generated by splot with zerrorfill using input columns
trans-unit.target: 栅栏图通过对齐它们的Y坐标并通过沿X的位移将它们彼此分开来组合几个2D图。填充基本值和每个图的Z值系列之间的区域可增强对齐对Y的视觉影响以及对Z的比较。有几种方法可以在gnuplot中创建此类图。最简单的是使用zerrorfill样式的5列变体。假设有分别由i索引的曲线z = Fi（y）。使用输入列通过zerrorfill生成散点图

trans-unit.source: Fig
trans-unit.target: Fig

trans-unit.source: Figure using this palette can be gray or color. For instance, in pm3d color surfaces the gray of each small spot is obtained by mapping the averaged z-coordinate of the 4 corners of surface quadrangles into the range [min_z,max_z] providing range of grays [0:1]. This value can be used directly as the gray for gray maps. The color map requires a transformation gray –> (R,G,B), i.e. a mapping [0:1] –> ([0:1],[0:1],[0:1]).
trans-unit.target: 使用此调色板的图可以是灰色或彩色。例如，在pm3d彩色表面中，通过将表面四边形的4个角的平均z坐标映射到提供灰度范围[0：1]的范围[min_z，max_z]中，可以获得每个小斑点的灰度。此值可以直接用作灰色地图的灰色。彩色图需要变换灰色–>（R，G，B），即[0：1] –>（[0：1]，[0：1]，[0：1]）映射。

trans-unit.source: Figures made this way can be scaled to fit into a document. The pic language is easy to understand, so the graphs can be edited by hand if need be. All co-ordinates in the pic-file produced by gnuplot are given as x+gnuplotx and y+gnuploty. By default x and y are given the value 0. If this line is removed with an editor in a number of files, one can put several graphs in one figure like this (default size is 5.0x3.0 inches):
trans-unit.target: 通过这种方式制作的图形可以缩放以适合文档。图片语言易于理解，因此可以根据需要手动编辑图形。gnuplot生成的图片文件中的所有坐标均以x + gnuplotx和y + gnuploty给出。默认情况下，x和y的值为0。如果用编辑器在许多文件中删除了此行，则可以将多个图形像这样放置在一个图形中（默认大小为5.0x3.0英寸）：

trans-unit.source: Finally, a nice quote from the manual of another fitting package (fudgit), that kind of summarizes all these issues: "Nonlinear fitting is an art!"
trans-unit.target: 最后,从另一个拟合包(fudgit)的手册中引用了一句话,算是对所有这些问题的总结。"非线性拟合是一门艺术!"

trans-unit.source: Finally, several smoothing kernels are available to calculate weighted averages: z = Sum_i w(d_i) * z_i / Sum_i w(d_i), where z_i is the value of the i-th data point and d_i is the distance between the current grid point and the location of the i-th data point. All kernels assign higher weights to data points that are close to the current grid point and lower weights to data points further away.
trans-unit.target: 最后,有几个平滑核可以用来计算加权平均值:z=Sum_i w(d_i)*z_i/Sum_i w(d_i),其中z_i是第i个数据点的值,d_i是当前网格点和第i个数据点位置之间的距离。所有的核对靠近当前网格点的数据点赋予较高的权重,对较远的数据点赋予较低的权重。

trans-unit.source: Fine control of the major (labeled) tics on the x axis is possible with the set xtics command. The tics may be turned off with the unset xtics command, and may be turned on (the default state) with set xtics. Similar commands control the major tics on the y, z, x2 and y2 axes.

These are tiny (5x8 pixels), small (6x12 pixels), medium, (7x13 Bold), large (8x16) or giant (9x15 pixels). These fonts cannot be scaled or rotated. Use one of these keywords instead of the font keyword. E.g.

trans-unit.source: Fonts are scaled assuming the page is 6 inches wide. If the size command is used to change the aspect ratio of the page or the CGM file is converted to a different width, the resulting font sizes will be scaled up or down accordingly. To change the assumed width, use the width option.
trans-unit.target: 假定页面为6英寸宽，字体将按比例缩放。如果使用size命令更改页面的长宽比或将CGM文件转换为其他宽度，则将相应地放大或缩小生成的字体大小。要更改假定的宽度，请使用width选项。

trans-unit.source: Fonts listed by fontfile or fontfile add encapsulate the font definitions of the listed font from a postscript Type 1 or TrueType font file directly into the gnuplot output postscript file. Thus, the enclosed font can be used in labels, titles, etc. See the section postscript fontfile for more details. With fontfile delete, a fontfile is deleted from the list of embedded files. nofontfiles cleans the list of embedded fonts.
trans-unit.target: 由fontfile或fontfile列出的字体添加将列出的字体的字体定义从Postscript Type 1或TrueType字体文件直接封装到gnuplot输出postscript文件中。因此，可以在标签，标题等中使用附带的字体。有关更多详细信息，请参见后继字体文件一节。使用fontfile delete，将从嵌入文件列表中删除一个字体文件。nofontfiles清除嵌入字体列表。

trans-unit.source: For 2D plots the fixed option is exactly equivalent to inside.
trans-unit.target: 对于2D图，固定选项与inside完全等效。

trans-unit.source: For 2D plotting, a parametric function is determined by a pair of parametric functions operating on a parameter. An example of a 2D parametric function would be plot sin(t),cos(t), which draws a circle (if the aspect ratio is set correctly — see set size). gnuplot will display an error message if both functions are not provided for a parametric plot.
trans-unit.target: 对于2D绘图，参数函数由在参数上运行的一对参数函数确定。二维参数函数的一个示例是plot sin（t），cos（t），它绘制了一个圆（如果正确设置了宽高比，请参见set size）。如果未为参数图提供这两个功能，gnuplot将显示一条错误消息。

trans-unit.source: For 3D graphs splot, the view and scaling of the graph can be changed with mouse buttons 1 and 2, respectively. A vertical motion of Button 2 with the shift key held down changes the xyplane. If additionally to these buttons the modifier <ctrl> is held down, the coordinate axes are displayed but the data are suppressed. This is useful for large data sets. Mouse button 3 controls the azimuth of the z axis (see set view azimuth).
trans-unit.target: 对于3D图形splot，可以分别使用鼠标按钮1和2更改图形的视图和比例。按住Shift键的同时按钮2的垂直运动会改变xyplane。如果在这些按钮之外还按住了修饰符<ctrl>，则会显示坐标轴，但会抑制数据。这对于大型数据集很有用。鼠标按钮3控制z轴的方位角（请参阅“ 设置视图方位角”）。

trans-unit.source: For 3D plotting, the surface is described as x=f(u,v), y=g(u,v), z=h(u,v). Therefore a triplet of functions is required. An example of a 3D parametric function would be cos(u)*cos(v),cos(u)*sin(v),sin(u), which draws a sphere. gnuplot will display an error message if all three functions are not provided for a parametric splot.
trans-unit.target: 对于3D绘图，表面描述为x = f（u，v），y = g（u，v），z = h（u，v）。因此，需要三元组的功能。3D参数函数的一个示例是cos（u）* cos（v），cos（u）* sin（v），sin（u），它绘制了一个球体。如果未为参数绘图提供所有三个功能，gnuplot将显示一条错误消息。

trans-unit.source: For plot, tics may be drawn on edges other than bottom and left by enabling the second axes – see set xtics for details.
trans-unit.target: 对于plot，可以通过启用第二个轴在底部和左侧以外的其他边缘上绘制tic –有关详细信息，请参见set xtics。

trans-unit.source: For rgbformulae three suitable mapping functions have to be chosen. This is done via rgbformulae <r>,<g>,<b>. The available mapping functions are listed by show palette rgbformulae. Default is 7,5,15, some other examples are 3,11,6, 21,23,3 or 3,23,21. Negative numbers, like 3,-11,-6, mean inverted color (i.e. 1-gray passed into the formula, see also positive and negative options below).
trans-unit.target: 对于rgbformulae，必须选择三个合适的映射函数。这是通过rgbformulae <r>，<g>，<b>完成的。可用的映射功能由show Palette Rgbformulae列出。默认为7,5,15，其他一些例子为3,11,6，21,23,3或3,23,21。负数，如3，-11，-6，平均反转颜色（即1-灰传递到上式中，也看到正和负以下选项）。

trans-unit.source: For splot, the concept of a rotational vector is implemented by a triple representing the vector to be oriented normal to the two-dimensional x-y plane. Naturally, the default is (0,0,1). Thus specifying both rotate and perpendicular together can orient data myriad ways in three-space.
trans-unit.target: 对于散点图，旋转矢量的概念由表示矢量垂直于二维xy平面的矢量的三元组实现。自然，默认值为（0,0,1）。因此，同时指定旋转和垂直方向可以在三空间中定向数据的多种方式。

trans-unit.source: For a cylindrical coordinate system, the data again occupy two or three columns. The first two are interpreted as theta (in the units specified by set angles) and z. The radius is either taken from the third column or set to unity, as in the spherical case. The mapping is:
trans-unit.target: 对于圆柱坐标系，数据再次占据两或三列。前两个解释为theta（以设定角度指定的单位）和z。半径可以从第三列获取，也可以像球形一样设置为1。映射为：

trans-unit.source: For a more complicated example, see the file "hexa.fnc" used by the "fit.dem" demo.
trans-unit.target: 更复杂的例子,请看 "fit.dem "演示使用的文件 "hexa.fnc"。

trans-unit.source: For a spherical coordinate system, the data occupy two or three columns (or using entries). The first two are interpreted as the azimuthal and polar angles theta and phi (or "longitude" and "latitude"), in the units specified by set angles. The radius r is taken from the third column if there is one, or is set to unity if there is no third column. The mapping is:
trans-unit.target: 对于球坐标系，数据占据两列或三列（或使用条目）。前两个被解释为方位角和极角theta和phi（或“经度”和“纬度”），以设定角度指定的单位表示。如果有第三列，则半径r从第三列获取；如果没有第三列，则将半径r设置为1。映射为：

trans-unit.source: For all options that expect lengths as their arguments they will default to 'cm' if no unit is specified. For all lengths the following units may be used: 'cm', 'mm', 'in' or 'inch', 'pt', 'pc', 'bp', 'dd', 'cc'. Blanks between numbers and units are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 对于所有需要长度作为参数的选项,如果没有指定单位,则默认为'cm'。对于所有长度,可以使用以下单位。cm'、'mm'、'in'或'inch'、'pt'、'pc'、'bp'、'dd'、'cc'。数字和单位之间不允许有空白。

trans-unit.source: For an average user of ConTeXt + gnuplot module it's recommended to refer to Using ConTeXt rather than reading this page or to read the manual of the gnuplot module for ConTeXt.
trans-unit.target: 对于ConTeXt + gnuplot模块的一般用户，建议参考使用ConTeXt，而不是阅读此页或阅读ConTeXt的gnuplot模块的手册。

trans-unit.source: For an example of using the stats command to annotate a subsequent plot, see stats.dem.
trans-unit.target: 有关使用stats命令注释后续绘图的示例，请参见stats.dem。

trans-unit.source: For color displays, gnuplot honors the following resources (shown here with their default values) or the greyscale resources. The values may be color names as listed in the BE rgb.txt file on your system, hexadecimal RGB color specifications (see BE documentation), or a color name followed by a comma and an intensity value from 0 to 1. For example, blue, 0.5 means a half intensity blue.
trans-unit.target: 对于彩色显示，gnuplot支持以下资源（此处以其默认值显示）或灰度资源。值可以是系统上BE rgb.txt文件中列出的颜色名称，十六进制RGB颜色规格（请参阅BE文档），或者是颜色名称后跟逗号和0至1 的强度值。例如，蓝色，0.5表示一半强度的蓝色。

trans-unit.source: For converting font files (either ttf or pfb) to pfa format, the conversion tool has to read the font from a file and write it to standard output. If the output cannot be written to standard output, on-the-fly conversion is not possible.
trans-unit.target: 要将字体文件(无论是ttf还是pfb)转换为pfa格式,转换工具必须从文件中读取字体并写入标准输出。如果不能将输出写到标准输出,则无法进行即时转换。

trans-unit.source: For data in a file, plot the average of the data in columns 2 and 3 against the datum in column 1, but only if the datum in column 4 is non-negative:
trans-unit.target: 对于文件中的数据,将第2列和第3列中的数据的平均值与第1列中的数据对比绘制,但前提是第4列中的数据是非负数。

trans-unit.source: For defining ellipse objects, see set object ellipse; for the 2D plot style, see ellipses.
trans-unit.target: 有关定义椭圆对象的信息，请参见set object ellipse；有关2D绘图样式的信息，请参见椭圆。

trans-unit.source: For each point in the file, the index value of the data set it appears in is available via the pseudo-column column(-2). This leads to an alternative way of distinguishing individual data sets within a file as shown below. This is more awkward than the index command if all you are doing is selecting one data set for plotting, but is very useful if you want to assign different properties to each data set. See pseudocolumns, lc variable.
trans-unit.target: 对于文件中的每个点，可通过伪列column（-2）获得文件中出现的数据集的索引值。这导致区分文件中各个数据集的另一种方法，如下所示。如果您要做的只是选择一个数据集进行绘图，则此操作比index命令更尴尬，但是如果您要为每个数据集分配不同的属性，这将非常有用。参见伪列，lc变量。

trans-unit.target: 例如:

trans-unit.source: For example, 'cmr' stands for Computer Modern Roman, 'ptm' for Times-Roman, and 'phv' for Helvetica. The font series denotes the thickness of the glyphs, in most cases 'm' for normal ("medium") and 'bx' or 'b' for bold fonts. The font shape is 'n' for upright, 'it' for italics, 'sl' for slanted, or 'sc' for small caps, in general. Some fonts may provide different font series or shapes.
trans-unit.target: 例如,"cmr "代表Computer Modern Roman,"ptm "代表Times-Roman,"phv "代表Helvetica。字体系列表示字形的粗细,在大多数情况下,'m'表示正常("中等"),'bx'或'b'表示粗体字。字体形状是'n'表示直立,'it'表示斜体,'sl'表示斜体,或'sc'表示小写体,一般情况下。有些字体可能提供不同的字体系列或形状。

trans-unit.source: For example, including Type 1 font files can be used for including the postscript output in LaTeX documents. The "european computer modern" font (which is a variant of the "computer modern" font) is available in pfb format from any CTAN server, e.g. ftp://ftp.dante.de/tex-archive/fonts/ps-type1/cm-super/
trans-unit.target: 例如，包括Type 1字体文件可用于在LaTeX文档中包括后记输出。可以从任何CTAN服务器以pfb格式获得“欧洲现代计算机”字体（它是“现代计算机”字体的变体），例如ftp://ftp.dante.de/tex-archive/fonts/ps-type1 / cm-super /

trans-unit.source: For example, the PostScript statement "/Color true def" (written into the file in response to the command set terminal postscript color), may be altered in an obvious way to generate a black-and-white version of a plot. Similarly line colors, text colors, line weights and symbol sizes can also be altered in straight-forward ways. Text (titles and labels) can be edited to correct misspellings or to change fonts. Anything can be repositioned, and of course anything can be added or deleted, but modifications such as these may require deeper knowledge of the PostScript language.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以以显而易见的方式更改PostScript语句“ / Color true def”（响应命令集终端的postscript color写入文件中），以生成绘图的黑白版本。同样，线条颜色，文本颜色，线条粗细和符号大小也可以直接更改。可以编辑文本（标题和标签）以纠正拼写错误或更改字体。可以重定位任何内容，当然也可以添加或删除任何内容，但是诸如此类的修改可能需要对PostScript语言有更深的了解。

trans-unit.source: For example, the command set format x "%Ddeg %5.2mmin %E" will cause x coordinate -1.51 to be labeled as " 1deg 30.60min W".
trans-unit.target: 例如，命令集格式x“％Ddeg％5.2mmin％E”将导致x坐标-1.51被标记为“ 1deg 30.60min W”。

trans-unit.source: For example, the file "sfrm1000.pfb" contains the normal upright fonts with serifs in the design size 10pt (font name "SFRM1000"). The computer modern fonts, which are still necessary for mathematics, are available from ftp://ftp.dante.de/tex-archive/fonts/cm/ps-type1/bluesky
trans-unit.target: 例如，文件“ sfrm1000.pfb”包含设计尺寸为10pt的带有衬线的常规直立字体（字体名称为“ SFRM1000”）。仍可用于数学的计算机现代字体可从ftp://ftp.dante.de/tex-archive/fonts/cm/ps-type1/bluesky获得

trans-unit.source: For example, whatever linetypes one and two look like to begin with, if you redefine them like this:
trans-unit.target: 例如,不管一开始的线型一和二是什么样的,如果你这样重新定义它们。

trans-unit.source: For execution of complete commands the evaluate command may also be handy.
trans-unit.target: 对于完整命令的执行，评估命令也很方便。

trans-unit.source: For gray mappings gamma correction can be turned on by set palette gamma <gamma>. <gamma> defaults to 1.5 which is quite suitable for most terminals.
trans-unit.target: 对于灰度映射，可以通过设置调色板gamma <gamma>来启用gamma校正。<gamma>默认为1.5，非常适合大多数终端。

trans-unit.source: For information about the definition and usage of functions in gnuplot, please see expressions. See also splines as user defined functions (spline.dem)
trans-unit.target: 有关gnuplot中函数的定义和用法的信息，请参见表达式。另请参见样条线作为用户定义的函数（spline.dem）

trans-unit.source: For linear least-squares (LLS), the user-defined function will be a sum of simple functions, not involving any parameters, each multiplied by one parameter. NLLS handles more complicated functions in which parameters can be used in a large number of ways. An example that illustrates the difference between linear and nonlinear least-squares is the Fourier series. One member may be written as
trans-unit.target: 对于线性最小二乘法(LLS),用户定义的函数将是简单函数的总和,不涉及任何参数,每个函数乘以一个参数。NLLS处理的是更复杂的函数,其中的参数可以被大量使用。一个说明线性和非线性最小二乘法之间区别的例子是傅立叶序列。一个成员可以写成

trans-unit.source: For loops in plot command
trans-unit.target: 对于情节命令中的循环

trans-unit.source: For matrix data a "block" and "point" correspond to "row" and "column". See matrix every.
trans-unit.target: 对于矩阵数据，“块”和“点”对应于“行”和“列”。每次见矩阵。

trans-unit.source: For monochrome displays, gnuplot does not honor foreground or background colors. The default is black-on-white. -rv or gnuplot*reverseVideo: on requests white-on-black.
trans-unit.target: 对于单色显示，gnuplot不支持前景色或背景色。默认值为黑白。-rv或gnuplot * reverseVideo：按要求黑底白字。

trans-unit.source: For more information please see the separate section under fonts.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见字体下的单独部分。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the complete list of terminals.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参阅端子的完整列表。

trans-unit.source: For ordinary files a "point" single record (line); a "block" of data is a set of consecutive records with blank lines before and after the block.
trans-unit.target: 对于普通文件来说,一个 "点 "的单条记录(行);一个 "块 "的数据是一组连续的记录,块的前后都是空行。

trans-unit.source: For output, i.e. tick labels along that axis or coordinates output by mousing, the function 'strftime' (type "man strftime" on unix to look it up) is used to convert from the internal time in seconds to a string representation of a date. gnuplot tries to figure out a reasonable format for this. You can customize the format using either set format x or set xtics format. See time_specifiers for a special set of time format specifiers. See also time/date for more information.
trans-unit.target: 对于输出（即沿该轴的刻度标签或通过鼠标进行坐标输出），功能“ strftime”（在unix上键入“ man strftime”以进行查找）用于将内部时间（以秒为单位）转换为日期的字符串表示形式。gnuplot尝试为此找到合理的格式。您可以使用set format x或set xtics format自定义格式。有关特殊的时间格式说明符集，请参见time_specifiers。另请参阅时间/日期以获取更多信息。

trans-unit.source: For pfb files "pfbtops" is a tool which can do this. If this program is installed on your system the on the fly conversion should work. Just try to encapsulate a pfb file. If the compiled in program call does not work correctly you can specify how this program is called by defining the environment variable GNUPLOT_PFBTOPFA e.g. to "pfbtops %s". The %s will be replaced by the font file name and thus has to exist in the string.
trans-unit.target: 对于pfb文件，“ pfbtops”是可以执行此操作的工具。如果在您的系统上安装了此程序，则即时转换应该可以工作。只需尝试封装pfb文件。如果编译后的程序调用无法正常工作，则可以通过定义环境变量GNUPLOT_PFBTOPFA来指定如何调用该程序，例如，将其定义为“ pfbtops％s”。的％S将由字体文件名被替换，因此具有在字符串中存在。

trans-unit.source: For positive m and n, each quadrangle or triangle is interpolated m-times and n-times in the respective direction. For negative m and n, the interpolation frequency is chosen so that there will be at least |m| and |n| points drawn; you can consider this as a special gridding function.
trans-unit.target: 对于正数m和n,每个四边形或三角形在各自的方向上被插值m次和n次。对于负的m和n,选择插值频率,以便至少有|m|和|n|个点被绘制;你可以把它看作是一个特殊的网格函数。

trans-unit.source: For related plotting styles see smooth frequency and smooth kdensity.
trans-unit.target: 有关相关的绘图样式，请参见平滑的频率和平滑的密度。

trans-unit.source: For some standard binary file formats gnuplot can extract all the necessary information from the file in question. As an example, "format=edf" will read ESRF Header File format files. For a list of the currently supported file formats, type show datafile binary filetypes.
trans-unit.target: 对于某些标准的二进制文件格式，gnuplot可以从该文件中提取所有必需的信息。例如，“ format = edf”将读取ESRF标头文件格式的文件。有关当前支持的文件格式的列表，请输入show datafile binary filetypes。

trans-unit.source: For some terminals (post, pdf) the size of the dot can be controlled by changing the linewidth.
trans-unit.target: 对于一些终端(post,pdf),可以通过改变线宽来控制点的大小。

trans-unit.source: For some terminals clear erases only the portion of the plotting surface defined by set size, so for these it can be used in conjunction with set multiplot to create an inset.
trans-unit.target: 对于一些终端清楚擦除所限定的绘图面的仅一部分集合大小，所以对于这些可以结合使用与集合的multiplot创建插图。

trans-unit.source: For some terminals, no plot is displayed until the command unset multiplot is given, which causes the entire page to be drawn and then returns gnuplot to its normal single-plot mode. For other terminals, each separate plot command produces an updated display.
trans-unit.target: 对于某些终端，在给出命令unset multiplot之前，不会显示任何图，这会导致绘制整个页面，然后将gnuplot返回其正常的单图模式。对于其他终端，每个单独的绘图命令都会生成更新的显示。

trans-unit.source: For special purposes you also can use a pipe (if available for your operating system). Therefore you start the file name definition with the character "<" and append a program call. This program has to write pfa data to standard output. Thus, a pfa file may be accessed by set fontfile "< cat garamond.pfa".
trans-unit.target: 出于特殊目的，您还可以使用管道（如果适用于您的操作系统）。因此，您可以使用字符“ <”开始文件名定义，并附加一个程序调用。该程序必须将pfa数据写入标准输出。因此，可以通过设置字体文件“ <cat garamond.pfa”访问pfa文件。

trans-unit.source: For standalone (whole-page) plots with labels in UTF-8 encoding:
trans-unit.target: 对于带有UTF-8编码标签的独立(整页)绘图。

trans-unit.source: For terminal drivers that access fonts by filename via the gd library, the font search path is controlled by the environmental variable GDFONTPATH.
trans-unit.target: 对于通过gd库按文件名访问字体的终端驱动程序,字体搜索路径由环境变量GDFONTPATH控制。

trans-unit.source: For terminal type be, gnuplot accepts (when initialized) the standard X Toolkit options and resources such as geometry, font, and name from the command line arguments or a configuration file. See the X(1) man page (or its equivalent) for a description of such options.
trans-unit.target: 对于终端类型be，gnuplot接受（初始化时）来自命令行参数或配置文件的标准X Toolkit选项和资源，例如几何，字体和名称。有关此类选项的说明，请参见X（1）手册页（或等效页）。

trans-unit.source: For terminal type x11, gnuplot accepts (when initialized) the standard X Toolkit options and resources such as geometry, font, and name from the command line arguments or a configuration file. See the X(1) man page (or its equivalent) for a description of such options.
trans-unit.target: 对于终端类型x11，gnuplot接受（初始化时）标准的X Toolkit选项和资源，例如命令行参数或配置文件中的几何，字体和名称。有关此类选项的说明，请参见X（1）手册页（或等效页）。

trans-unit.source: For text input, a blank line or comment line ends the matrix, and starts a new surface mesh. You can select among the meshes inside a file by the index option to the splot command, as usual.
trans-unit.target: 对于文本输入，空白行或注释行会终止矩阵，并开始新的曲面网格。与往常一样，可以通过splot命令的index选项在文件内部的网格中进行选择。

trans-unit.source: For text input, if the first row contains column labels rather than data, use the additional keyword columnheaders. Similarly if the first field in each row contains a label rather than data, use the additional keyword rowheaders. Here is an example that uses both:

trans-unit.source: For time data you must provide the range in quotes, using the same format used to read time from the datafile. See set timefmt.
trans-unit.target: 对于时间数据，您必须使用与从数据文件中读取时间相同的格式，用引号提供范围。请参阅set timefmt。

trans-unit.source: For using the encapsulated font file you have to specify the font name (which normally is not the same as the file name). When embedding a font file by using the fontfile option in interactive mode, the font name is printed on the screen. E.g.
